Suddenly there was a loud crash from the darkest corner of the room which made them jump out of their skin, they were certainly not alone.

"What the hell was that?!!" Blossom said in a hoarse whisper to Buttercup.

"No idea!! Turn on the light and find out!" She answered, so slowly Blossom edged to the light switch and flipped it on.

The light made a strange hissing noise and then illuminated the room with an eerie purple light.

"Sice when was our light purple?" Blossom asked uncertainly.

"This isn't our light at all" Buttercup said slowly, as if she was quoting something she'd heard along time ago, "This isn't our anything"

Blossom looked puzzled, "What do you mean?" She said

"Geez I thought you were meant to be brainy" Bubbles said venomously, "Buttercup means that, where ever we are, as much as it may seem like home, it isn't. I'd say we were in some kind of parallel universe" she ended impressively.

"Enough!" Buttercup said before Blossom could respond to Bubbles, "Lets check out where that noise came from".

So the 3 girls edged their way to the corner the noise had come from (Blossom waddled instead of edged, due to the fact that her already torn dress was threatening to explode at the seams).

It was...
111122122211221211221211.title: Something isn't right...

1111221222112212112212111.content:
Bubbles cuddly toys were doing things which normal cuddly toys didn't, namely they were having a tea party without the aid of a person. Bubbles, who had certainly been displaying her dark side lately, squealed with joy at this magical sight (her sinister act shattering before her childish nature). The toys turned and looked at the 3 girls, their lifeless eyes staring the girls dead in the eyes.

"Err... Bubbles, I don't think these toys are very friendly" Buttercup said in a very unsteady voice.

Blossom evidently agreed with this statement, but Bubbles wasn't even listening, she was enthralled by the magically animated toys.

Suddenly...
1111221222112212112212111.title: Magic toys

The toys jumped over Bubbles as if she wasn't even there, and fell upon the shocked figures of Blossom and Buttercup (although the figure of Blossom was much larger than the shocked figure of Buttercup). Blossom and Buttercup tried to fight the toys off, but there were too many of them and they also appeared to be alot stronger than they looked.

"Bubbles!!! A little help would be greatly appreciated!" Buttercup yelled, but Bubbles just stood with the same smile on her face, which indicated that she had definitely left the real world and was currently residing on Planet Bubbles.

"Do not speak to our God commoner!!" One of the toys yelled, which made Blossom and Buttercup jump.

"God?" Blossom managed to say through a mouthful of teddy bear

"That's right!" Said Octy (Bubbles purple octopus toy), "All these years she has cared for us, she has put us infront of everything, even saving the world!"

Blossom and Buttercup exchanged glances at this, Bubbles certainly did take those toys everywhere, when she was meant to be saving Townsville she did often become pre - occupied with her toys, Blossom and Buttercup were forever taking them off her and telling her to grow up... they hoped this fact wouldn't be raised in the conversation.

"And you 2 were forever trying to make her stop!" Octy said in a raised voice ("Damn!" Blossom thought).

"But you were just toys" Buttercup said, "she used to talk to you, but you didn't speak back, you were inanimate objects she spoke to because she couldn't deal with the real world!".

Blossom actually felt the mood change in the room, as if there was a sudden gust of wind.

"That wasn't a very nice thing to say" Octy said in a dangerous voice, "we have the power of speech and movement now, we aren't objects at all infact..." Octy let out a calm breath (But where the breath came from the girls didn't know), "...We are PEOPLE!" Octy ended dramatically, there was the loud sounds of agreement from the rest of the toys, then Octy spoke again,

"We owe Bubbles for her deeds, and our first act of repayment will be to get back at her mean sisters!!!", the loud shouts and screams of agreement sounded once more from the toys.

What happens next?
11112212221122121122121112.title: Atttttack!!

111122122211221211221211122.content:
"Okay girls, we're going to have a little... tea party" Octy said mischievously, "But these clothes just won't do!", Octy clicked his tentacles and 2 of Bubbles very large teddy bears (they were nearly as large as the girls, well... maybe not as large as Blossom) emerged from the crowd of toys and grabbed Buttercup and Blossom.

"Get off me you darn dirty bear!!" Buttercup screamed, Buttercup was without a doubt the toughest fighter but even she could not break free of the bears grip.

"BUBBLESSS!!!" Blossom yelled, but Bubbles merely laughed and returned to the conversation she'd been having with a group of the toys.

Blossom and Buttercup were thrust onto their bed (Blossoms impact definitely flattened the bed somewhat) and were instantly covered by teddy bears, dolls and other toys, each tearing at the girls dresses in an attempt to undress them (they had a head start with Blossoms torn dress of course). The 2 sisters kicked and squirmed trying to get the evil toys off them, but it was no use, within a minute the 2 girls were already out of their matching dresses and were being thrust into dresses, which did indeed still match, but they were different from their old ones. They looked like the kind of dresses that you saw in fairy tales (namely that of 'Dorothy' in 'The Wizard of Oz'), the dress had puffy shoulders, a pinny ontop of the actual dress which was attached by 2 large buttons on either shoulder and had a check pattern on it (the pattern being the same colour as the dress below), there was a big bow around the waist of the dress (which was baby pink on both the dresses), the pinny made up one layer of the dress (the dress which was underneath the pinny had 3 other layers besides, each one extremely thick and frilly). Blossoms dress was pinkish red and was obviously a larger size than Buttercups and Buttercups was a deep green (each the same colour as their old dresses). When the dresses had been secured and done up the toys pulled out combs and make - up and began to assault the girls faces and hair ("GET OFF! GET OFF!!" Buttercup and Blossom had been screaming since they had been swamped by the toys). The girls hair was platted into pig tails, Blossoms pig tails were tied with pinkish red ribbons, Buttercups was alot shorter than Blossoms (her reason being that long hair slowed her down), infact it was too short to be platted into pigtails, bu the toys had managed to get it into 2 bunches and tie each one up with a green ribbon.
The toys then applied lipstick (Blossoms lipstick was red and Buttercups was black), blush (abit too much maybe, because the girls cheeks were abit overly red as a result) and abit of mascara (green for Buttercup and red for Blossom). Then the girls were ready for the tea party (each girl strangely looking like dolls). The girls were pulled towards a mirror and were allowed to survey themselves in it.

"I look like a God damn doll! Man I feel like a dork!" Buttercup said, disgust in every silable.

"Yeah... me too!" Blossom said sadly, "But at least the dress hides my fat" She added, "Not for long..." Octy said in a evil whisper, the girls didn't hear him...

What happens now?

The girls were sat opposite each other in plastic chairs (the chairs were very strong seeing as they had to support Blossoms weight), Bubbles sat at the head of the table (she was now wearing a plastic crown) and Octy sat at the other end.

"So what then?" Buttercup said fearlessly, "we have to drink tea and eat biscuits? OOOH! REVENGE!", Blossom really wished Buttercup would think about what she was doing before she opened her mouth, because she knew Buttercups sarcasm would be answered with venom. Bubbles grinned dangerously...

What happens?
1111221222112212112212111221.title: Fearless (and stupid) Buttercup

It sends the girls to sleep
11112212221122121122121112212.content:
"Have some tea won't you?" Bubbles said calmly, and she poured 2 cups of ordinary looking tea, "Don't worry" she added seemingly reading her sisters expressions, "It's not poisonous".

Blossom and Buttercup exchanged worried looks, "Errr...I don't like tea..." Buttercup began, but was silenced as one of the large teddy bears picked up one of the cups, forced Buttercups mouth open and poured the tea down her throat, leaving her coughing and spluttering.

"Dear oh dear Buttercup, I think you need a bib" Bubbles said with mock concern, and nodded at the large teddy bear. The bear tied a pink baby bib around the neck of the spluttering Buttercup.

"You...BITCH!" Buttercup managed to say through labored breaths.

Bubbles sighed, "Gag her" She said, in a voice that suggested she pitied Buttercups moronic inability to control her mouth. Buttercup kicked and screamed as the bear tightened a gag around her mouth.

"MMMMF FUMMMM OOOH BISH!!!" Buttercup said, her frantically angry voice muffled.

"Now Blossom" Bubbles said, ignoring Buttercups muffled screams and cries, "Perfect, beautiful Blossm... hmmm not quite as slender as you used to be are you?, she said as she prodded Blossoms flabby gut, "Ah yes... you've let yourself go haven't you?" She said happily.

"GO TO HELL!!!" Blossom yelled, she hadn't really intended on saying it, it had just come out. Bubbles eyes flashed dangerously, "Drink your tea", she said calmly, "Or I'll have it forced down your god damn throat!"

Blossom grudgingly raised the cup to her lips, her eyes never leaving Bubbles, and drank it.

What happens?
11112212221122121122121112212.title: The madness of Bubbles

As Blossom finished her tea, she heard a rumble from the direction of Buttercup. Blossom looked up and saw Buttercup groaning and clutching her stomach (although there wasn't really a stomach to clutch, seeing as it was just a 6 pack), which was rumbling loudly.

"Remove her gag" Ordered Bubbles. A beanie unicorn toy obeyed the command and pulled the gag from around the groaning Buttercups mouth.

"Awww... is Buttercup hungry?" Bubbles said in a voice which would have been better suited from talking to babies.

Buttercup looked ashamed of herself as she slowly nodded her head. Blossoms considerable belly began to rumble at this point, it felt like she hadn't eaten for decades.

"Don't worry Blossom" Bubbles said through a large grin, "Bring the food!" She ordered. The toys parted allowing a huge trolley, filled to the brim with pasties, cakes, donuts, milkshakes, burgers, chips, ice cream and other super fattening treats, to be guided through by the 2 large teddy bears.

What do Blossom and Buttercup do?
111122122211221211221211122121.title: Soooo hungryyyy

choices: Blossom and Buttercup are left to sleep

Buttercup immediately fell upon the huge pile of food and began piling food into her mouth like there was no tomorrow, she ate so fast that she didn't even have time to taste the food before it had vanished down her gullet and into her stomach. Bubbles laughed uproariously at the sight of her sister, who barely ate anything except power bars, gorge herself on all the fattening food stuffs.

Blossom watched in horror, but it wasn't long until she was overpowered by hunger and began stuffing her face as well.

The girls ate at an amazing speed, but the food quantity didn't reduce at all, as it kept regenerating faster than the girls could eat it. Blossoms body could handle this assault, due to the almost 24 hour food beating it had received at the hands of Buttercup and Bubbles (and also Him), but Buttercups certainly couldn't. After about 30 minutes of furious eating, Buttercups once washboard stomach was now rounded and obviously her much discomfort. Buttercup stopped eating and began rubbing her bloated stomach (which was now pushing slightly against her dress).

"Ooooh!" Buttercup groaned, "If I eat another bite I'll explode!" She said slowly, taking deep breaths after each word.

Bubbled gave an icy smile, "Come on Buttercup!" She said, "Blossom managed much more than that when we first fed her, I'm sure you could manage more".

"I realllllly can't!" Buttercup moaned, "I don't want to be fat! I can't eat anymore!", Bubbles sighed, "Feed her!" She ordered and the 2 large bears began grabbing food and unceremoniously shoving it into Buttercups shocked mouth and forced her to chew and swallow it.

"GET <MMMF> ORFFF MEEE!! BUB<ULSH> YOU <MMFFF>UCKIN B<ISH>!!!" Buttercup screamed through mouthfuls of fatty foods. Bubbles leant towards Buttercup, her eyes full of malice.

"Watch your mouth" She said in a very slow and dangerous voice. Buttercup opened her mouth to respond, but Bubbles shoved a jam donut into it roughly and made her swallow it, making Buttercup choke.

Blossom wasn't even paying attention, as she had been stuffing her face none stop and hadn't even looked up from her food (she was currently ravaging a huge tray of sticky buns).

Ten minutes later Buttercup was crying, her stomach was like a basketball and was pushed tight against her dress, it was emitting gurgling noises and was obviously hurting quite abit. Blossoms stomach looked like a beach ball, it was divided into 2 big fat roles and was clearly visible through her dress (it was straining the ribbon which was wrapped around her middle) as it was resting on the tops of her big thick thighs.

"Hmmm, looks like you 2 have eaten like pigs" Bubbles said evilly, "We'll have to continue this some other time", Buttercup glared through tear filled eyes at Bubbles, her face was a mask of hatred.

1111221222112212112212111221211.title: The feast

"I think you'd better get off to bed" Bubbles said, "It's way past you bed time", Buttercup flushed.

"You evil BITCH!" She roared, "You really are crazy!! You should be locked away and have the key thrown into a fucking volcano!". Bubbles shook her head sadly, Blossom braced herself for the ferocity that Bubbles retaliation was bound to have.

"Tsk tsk" Bubbles said finally, "It looks like you need a bit of discipline dear sister! Blossom go to bed NOW! Buttercup come with me"

Blossom climbed under the covers of the large soft bed, truly terrified at what Bubbles would do if she disobeyed her, Bubbles brain had clearly been polluted for a very long time, and Blossom felt stupid for not noticing how truly crazy she was earlier on. Buttercup was still defying Bubbles, Blossom couldn't figure out whether Buttercup was stubborn, stupid or crazy, as she had witnessed first hand what Bubbles would do when he superiority was threatened, Blossom figured that Buttercup was abit of each.

"Oh yeah? What are you gonna do to me then?" Buttercup said in a clearly mocking tone, "Make me eat another sandwich? Oooo! Scary!"

For the first time in as many hours, Bubbles looked truly surprised, for it was clear that Bubbles thought she could break Buttercups spirit, but no matter what she did Buttercup stood firm and sneered.

"No Buttercup not just a sandwich" She said after a slight pause, "You'll see soon enough, Blossom sleep, Buttercup follow me!"

Blossom did as she was told, the bed was intoxicatedly comfortable, even though she was still fully dressed, she was sound asleep within 5 minutes, as Buttercup was led from the room and towards her new punishment.
111122122211221211221211122121112.title: Buttercup sneers

1111221222112212112212111221211122.content:
Buttercup sneered as she was led away to her punishment.

"Just you wait Bubbles" She said dangerously, "If you think I bullied you bad before... just wait till I escape" She laughed softly, "I'll make your life a living hell!"

Bubbles glared at Buttercup furiously, but still managed to keep her calm demeanor.

"Cocky till the end aye Buttercup?" Bubbles smiled evilly, "Your body will be even bigger than that ego of yours"

Buttercup was led into a darkroom, the doorway of which was guarded by 2 large teddy bears. The room itself was quite large, and certainly wasn't there in the real Utonium household, the only thing in it was a large steal high chair, which was a much larger version of the kind of chair a young child may use. Buttercup scoffed loudly obviously unimpressed.

"That's it?" She said rolling her eyes

Suddenly one of the largest bears grabbed her roughly from behind and lifted her into the large chair. The bear then proceeded to fasten her into the chair; he tightened her in with a belt around the abdomen, which was tightened more so as Buttercups new girth pressed against it uncomfortably and secured her arms and legs with manacles so she was unable to move.

"LET ME GO!!" Buttercup screeched

Bubbles looked highly amused,

"What happened to your tough talk?" She said softly "I guess your scared that your about to get a taste of your own medicine... scared that cute little Bubbles is finally going to get some revenge!"

"LET ME GO YOU BITCH!!" Buttercup wailed frantically,

Bubbles tutted, "Dear oh dear" She said, "That mouth of yours. Don't you know the saying; 'If you can't say anything nice, don't say anything at all?'"

Buttercup continued to shout, struggle, scream and swear, Bubbles looked like she had finally had enough.

"Will you shut that bitch up?" She ordered, and the largest teddy complied by pulling a lever next to the chair.

A hatch in the ceiling opened and 2 robotic arms descended, which grabbed Buttercup by the head and forced her face upwards.

"WHAT THE FUCK?!?" Bellowed Buttercup, who was now writhing and screeching worse than ever, "GET THE FUCK OFF ME!!"

A large funnel was then lowered from the same hatch by another robotic arm, and was forced into her mouth and held there.

"MMMMMF!" Came the muffled rantings of Buttercup.

"Ahhh, that's better" Said a satisfied Bubbles, she grinned and walked slowly towards the struggling form of her sister. "You've let yourself go abit haven't you my dear?" Crooned Bubbles as she poked Buttercups new belly, "I haven't even got started yet my little piggy" She said and squeezed Buttercups cheek, Buttercup tried to move away but was unable to due to her restraints.

"Begin" Said Bubbles and stepped away from Buttercup.

What happens next?
1111221222112212112212111221211122.title: Buttercups punishment

choices: Buttercup is forced to drink twice as much as before
11112212221122121122121112212111222.content:
With that the large teddy bear pulled another lever on the wall and a torrent of the very same super weight gain milkshake that Buttercup had previously fed Blossom, rushed down the funnel directly into Buttercups open mouth. Bubbles sneered at her helpless sister.

"Ironic isn't it Buttercup?" She asked conversationally, "Being forced to drink the same thing that we forced our sister to drink only last night"

Buttercup tried in vain to stop herself swallowing the fattening mixture but it was no use, the weight gain shake flooded down her throat and into her belly and there was nothing Buttercup could do about it.

Bubbles watched in glee as her sister began to slowly expand before her. She laughed uproariously everytime Buttercup tried to stop swallowing the milkshake, as it caused her bright red, overly blushed cheeks to puff out ridiculously. She laughed especially hard when tears began to form in Buttercups eyes, causing her sexy green mascara to start running slightly.

Buttercup could actually feel herself expand as the mixture filled her belly. She could feel the cold, creamy liquid push her belly outwards against the many soft layers of the extravagant dress she had been forced to wear. The bottom layer of the dress (which was a lace corset) started to feel rather tight as her belly expanded against it.

"MMMMFFFF" Said Buttercup in discomfort as the corset struggled to contain her growing belly.

"What was that Buttercup?" Crooned Bubbles, mockingly putting her hand to her ear, "I didn't quite catch that", she grabbed Buttercup roughly by her hair bunches, "Say again" she said

"PWEAASE SHHHTOP" Buttercup managed to say through mouthful after mouthful of the weight gain shake.

Bubbles sneered, "You want me to stop?" She said, "What happened to the insolent Buttercup of 15 minutes ago? The cocky loud mouth who ridiculed the punishment small pathetic little Bubbles was about to give her, hmmm?" Bubbles pinched Buttercups over powdered, red cheeks.

"PWEEEASE" Pleaded Buttercup pathetically.

"You'll have to do better than that Buttercup!" Snorted Bubbles, "Come on, you don't want to be fat do you? Beg for me to stop!"

Tears and mascara began to run down Buttercups face, "MMMMFPWEASH III BWEGG YOU PWEASHHH SHHTOP!" Wailed Buttercup frantically.

Bubbles smiled, "You know Buttercup, I could honestly say I don't hate Blossom, sorry to change the subject but I'm going somewhere with this." Bubbles began "Yes, I don't hate her. Sure I don't like her, and did enjoy fattening her up and ruining her image, but I only did that out of jealousy not out of hatred. You on the other hand Buttercup, have made my life a living hell up until this point. So let me share this with you Buttercup... i absolutely despise you and always have, and no matter how much you plead and beg I am not going to stop!"

Bubbles smiled and turned to the large teddy bear, "Increase the flow" She ordered

"MMMFFFFF" Wailed Buttercup frantically and she struggled desperately with the restraints which bound her.

11112212221122121122121112212111222.title: Not so cocky now, aye Buttercup?

choices: After half an hour Buttercup is released
111122122211221211221211122121112221.content:
Buttercups eyes widened as a loud click was heard, swiftly followed by a loud swooshing noise which indicated the flow increasing immensely. Buttercup braced herself for the worst and initially as the fattening liquid reached her mouth she attempted to use her mouth to block the flow. Bubbles laughed harshly at this pointless endeavor, as the flow was much too strong and Buttercups cheeks were soon inflated comically by the weight gain mix. As the mixture was forced down her throat she could once again feel her midsection begin to bloat out more and more. Buttercups head lolled from side to side, her mind in a complete haze from the force feeding she was enduring. Bubbles took the opportunity to further torment her captive and played with Buttercups bunches while she spoke in her sisters ear.

"So tell me Buttercup, if you can.. Exactly how hard did you have to work to get that body of yours?" Crooned Bubbles.

"MRRFFSHH!" Was the only response that Buttercup could manage and Bubbles giggled.

"Well if you think Blossoms fat, just you wait till i'm done with you dear sister..." Bubbles said evilly, poking Buttercups ever expanding belly as she spoke which caused Buttercup to give a muffled moan.

Bubbles could feel how squashed Buttercups stomach was against the corset part of her dress, and for a moment she considered loosening it a little to allow more room for growth but soon decided it would be much more amusing to see Buttercups belly do this job for her. As Buttercup consumed the weight gain shake it was in fact distributing itself as fat throughout her body much quicker than it did with Blossom, and it was actually possible to see her body swell slowly with the new weight. This was because that the rules in this alternative reality were entirely governed by Hims magick, so weight was gained much quicker than in reality. Buttercup groaned mornfully, because she could actually feel this process happening. She could feel the bottom layer of her dress becoming subtly tighter all over her body, rather than just at her midsection and the thought of losing her figure in such a way caused a lone tear to leak from her eye and run down her overly blushed cheek. Buttercups once slim face was beginning to look little fuller and healthier, although it couldn't even be classed as chubby yet, it still appeared softer. Buttercup groaned again as she felt her breasts slowly pushing outward against her slowly tightening bra, which was causing a nice cleavage above the corset layer of her dress. Unlike Blossom who had received a lot of weight to the stomach area, Buttercups weight was seemingly distributing itself much more evenly, giving an equal layer of soft fat over body. Buttercups eyes were watering as she slumped groggily back in her chair, letting off the odd muffled moan and groan as her stomach, which was now visible under her dress as a bulge in the middle, pushed the corset to its limits. After another five minutes a big RIP! and a POP! were heard as Buttercups taut stomach finally exploded the seams of the corset and violently surged forward into the next layer of the dress (the force of which almost ripping that layer also) and rested on the tops of her thighs. Bubbles laughed uproariously at the sight of Buttercups overfed belly suddenly surging obviously outward and Buttercup let out a muffled sigh, obviously relieved at the new acquired space.

111122122211221211221211122121112221.title: Increase the flow

After the elapsed time of 30 minutes, Bubbles was satisfied. She motioned to her toys. "Alright, you can let her free now. Lead her into her bedroom." With that, the toys freed the husky Buttercup from her captivity, although with her newly acquired weight it was quite hard to walk around.

Buttercup gave a large, unladylike belch and yet another layer of her her dress popped open. As she was lead away, she glared at Bubbles. "This isn't over. When I get my hands on you, you will wish you have never been born. I'll make you get what you deserve, you little bi-MMPH!" she exclaimed as one of the toys shoved a jam donut into Buttercup's mouth. Bubbles just snickered. " Tsk,Tsk, Buttercup. And here I thought you learned your lesson. I guess you'll never change." Bubbles sped over to Buttercup's ear and whispered "I'm going to make your life a living hell from now on. I'll make sure you're so fat, that when you stand next to Blossom, you make her look skinny." Bubbles smiled a mean smile at her piggy sister. "Have a nice night. Don't eat your pillow." Buttercup swore ferociously as shae was lead away, and Bubbles' laughter echoed off the walls.

Buttercup looked at the table and saw there was more of the appetite tea. She grabbed a cup of it and creeped behind Bubbles as Bubbles was talking to the bears. Within seconds, Buttercup grabs Bubbles and pours all the tea down her throat. Blossom (who is still eating) throws Buttercup an eclair as Buttercup stuffs it down Bubble's throat.

“Heh heh, how’d you like a taste of your own medicine?” taunted Buttercup, with newfound confidence.

She is also going as far as stuffing food in Bubbles’s mouth as well.

111122122211221212.content:

Blossom was on the first day of her world tour, and decided to land in Japan for her first stop. While she was interested in the culture, she did have a secondary motive...

-----

Roughly two months before her sisters and herself graduated, Blossom was in the living room, getting an early start on studying for the final exams. While in a brief moment of boredom, she scanned the house with her X-ray vision. She almost cried out in shock when she looked up at the bathroom.

Bubbles's stomach had somehow inflated. After she watched her sister deflate herself, Blossom was shell-shocked to say the least.

-----

In the time between then and now, Blossom had experimented in trying to inflate herself, but met with little success. She learned her body had the elasticity for inflation, but she couldn't do it herself like Bubbles did that night.

There were two options that Blossom had considered over her inflation: talk to Bubbles or "borrow" some the Professor's equipment. She could've asked Bubbles how she did it, but Blossom respected her sister's privacy over her new found power. Also, the Professor would've noticed that some of his gas tanks were missing.

Blossom figured that while she was out, she could try and improve her inflation skills. And one place was as good as any, so, she thought, she might as well try at every place she planned to go.

Sabrina and Chloe played basketball in the wretching heat for 30 minutes. "Cool, a sports drink, that'll reentergize ourselves by drinking it!" said Chloe as Sabrina drank some of he sports drink. Hilda angrily grumbled and continued to eat slice after slice. "Well see ya later porky. I have to get the car from the shop." Said Zelda walking out the door. "I'll shoe you whose the fat one." 141211.title: Mqgic Spell backfired

Zelda quickly turned around and used her wand to reflect the spell Hilda just cast. Hilda couldn't react fast enough and was hit by her own spell. She hit the ground and scrambled to get up. "Ugh. I can't believe this!" she screamed seeing Zelda round the corner. Hilda was about to go after her until she felt really hungry. 

"Oh No! It's the spell!" she whined. Trying to resist the hunger but failing Hilda ran for the fridge and ate every morsel of food in the fridge. Pizza, ice cream, and steak. She ate it all. After which she patted her slightly round belly. Now Hilda became hungry. Again. Hilda then wanted to go to a buffet. She walked down the street to....
1412111.title: Zelda reflects it

choices: Theres a knock at the door
14211.content:
*Beep Beep Beep Beep*

Mistys alarm buzzed annoyingly jolting her awake. She pushed her beautiful red hair out of hair face groggily (she had not yet tied it up in her trademark style), wiped the sleep from her dazzling blue eyes and stifled a yawn. She consulted the clock next to her bed and discovered that it was 10am, which meant it was time to get up and begin her training routine.

Misty had always trained extremely hard, both mentally and physically, which was the reason she had such an amazing body (which had won the admiration of many men, most recently that of Brock) and strong mind. The training she now faced was however even more excruciating than usual because she was training for the Emerald Poke'mon Tournament, which was one of the biggest Poke'mon tournaments in the world and would be held at the end of the month. Misty was actually one of the favorites to win the tournament and so she was determined to do so, so that she would finally get the recognition she deserved as one of the best Poke'mon trainers in the world.

Misty tied her hair up in her trademark style, dressed herself (in her trademark clothing of denim shorts and yellow top with braces) and vaulted out of bed, suddenly full of energy as she focused her mind on the tournament to come. After about 40 minutes of stretching and yoga, she entered her own private gym and started to use the various equipment she had at her disposal.

Suddenly...
14211.title: Mistys training

142111.content:
Suddenly Misty heard the phone ringing in the ajoining room. She rose slowly to her feet her muscles aching slightly from her workout, and wandered to over to the ringing phone.

"Hello?" She said

Who is it?
142111.title: The phone rings

choices: She obeys and rushes over to the school
She realizes its a trap and doesn't go.
1421112.content:
"Misty!" Said the voice on the other end, the tone startled her.

"Yes?" She replied quizically

"Ash and Brock are in trouble! Come quickly to the abandoned school on the far side of town!" Said the voice urgently

Misty looked dubious "Who is this?" She asked suspiciously, the voice on the other end cracked noticeably.

"Erm..." Said the voice, panicked "It's that guy... you know.. err.. Whatshisname.. Professor Mung..lo..son..... Just come quick!"

The phone went dead, leaving Misty staring at the receiver confused.

What does she do?
1421112.title: Strange phonecall

choices: Misty has a suprise of her own
14211121.content:
Still more than a little dubious of the strange phonecall, Misty put the phone down and quickly rushed out the door. Outside she climbed on to her bike and sped off in the direction of the school, he red hair blowing in the wind.

Meanwhile at the school, Team Rocket were in a full blown argument.

"Of course she didn't fall for it you complete cretin" Jessie said scornfully to James "Professor Mungloson? What the hell was that about?"

"I panicked" He replied weakly

"She may be an annoying pipsqueak James, but she isnt that stupid! What are we going to do now if she doesn't come?" She asked scornfully

James looked at his feet, shifting his weight uncomfortably, he didnt reply. Suddenly something caught Jessies eye outside.

"I don't believe it!" She said in amazement, as she saw Misty pull up on her bike outside "She fell for it!"

What happens next?
14211121.title: The trap

142112.content:
Suddenly there was a loud knock at the door, followed by the door bell ringing.

"Alright alright!" Called Misty, annoyed at being interrupted during her training session, "I'm coming!"

She walked to the door and opened it roughly.

Who was there?
142112.title: *Knock knock*

choices: They walk to the training centre
On the way they run into Team Rocket
1421121.content:
Mistys glower eased when she found her 2 friends standing on her door step, although she was still mildly annoyed at not being able to train as she'd planned.

"Hey Misty!" Said Ash brightly

"Pika Pika!" Said Pikachu at his side, equally as brightly.

"Hey guys" Answered Misty, evidently not quite as happy to see them as they were her, "Come in and make yourselves at home"

The group entered the house and Misty closed the door. Brock seemed to notice the slight annoyance Misty was exhibiting and so decided to see what was wrong.

"Were we interrupting something?" He asked

Misty knew her slight mood had been noticed and felt a little guilty for it. These were her best friends after all and she was very happy to see them.

"No no..." She said ".. I was just planning to train is all..."

"Oh, that's no problem then!" He said happily, "That's actually why we are here!"

What happens next?
1421121.title: Ash and Brock

choices: Brock wants to show Misty a new technique he's developed for Psyduck
Ash wants to show Misty a new trick he's learnt
14211211.content:
After a short brisk walk the group reached the training gym, which was a rather shabby looking building but had all the facilities they needed. The interior looked like a school gym and seemed to be deserted of trainers, the only other person present was the caretaker who eyed them suspiciously as they entered. Ash took a big dramatic intake of breath when they entered the main battle/training area.

"This is what its all about huh guys?" He said, Brock and Misty exchanged glances before nodding.

"So.." Said Misty, "Was there any particular reason you wanted to do this today?"

What happens next?
14211211.title: They walk to the training centre

choices: It works! But there's a problem...
142112111.content:
To Mistys slight surprise it was Brock who answered her.

"Well.." He began, "I think I may have discovered a technique which could turn Psyduck into a very effective weapon"

"Pffff" Said Misty, completely unconvinced "That'll be the day"

"Bring him out" Said Brock seriously, "I'll show you what I mean"

Misty eyed Brock sardonically, but then stopped not wanting to seem too hostile. Maybe Brock was on to something she thought, though she doubted it immensely. She brought out the Poke'ball which contained and threw it.

"Go Psyduck" She said with little enthusiasm.

At once the familiar figure of Psyduck appeared, its goggily eyes staring back at Misty with usual stupid, confused expression.

"Go on then Brock" She said, "Lets see what you can do"

Brock knelt down and stared at Psyduck dead in the eyes, unblinking. Psyduck merely gazed back stupidly.

"The trick is" Said Brock, "to try and get Psyduck to enter your mind.. as it is an extremely powerful psychic Poke'mon it takes instruction a lot easier through psychic interaction"

Misty still looked unconvinced, but gave Brock the benefit of the doubt as she was watched with some small interest.

What happens next?
142112111.title: The thing with Psyducks is...

1421121111.content:
After a few minutes Misty was about to tell Brock to stop this nonsense, but all of a sudden a bright blue light started emitting from Psyduck.

"Woah.." Said Misty, having never seen Psyduck do anything like this before.

"Make it do something!" Said Ash excitedly.

Brock attempted to focus his mind, truth be told he hadn't thought he'd get his far and as such he hadn't really researched in any great detail how he was actually supposed to give instruction through this 'psychic interaction', but he tried regardless. Starting off slow he attempted to tell Psyduck, via his thoughts, to jump into the air. The problem however was Brock hadn't eaten today so all he could think of at present was food. On top of this the rest of his mind was occupied with thoughts of Misty as, secretly, he had a bit of a crush on the pretty young red head. These 2 thoughts were all that Psyduck could understand and so, rather confused he obeyed Brocks instruction.

"Well?" Said Misty, "Make it do something!"

"Im trying!" Said Brock testilly.

Brock, Ash and Pickachu were all kneeling and staring at Psyduck, talking amongst themselves about what could of gone wrong. Because of this they didn't realize something had gone horribly wrong. Mistys first clue that something wasn't quite right, was a strange sound coming from somewhere else in the gym. It sounded like something hurtling through the air, and she listened intently trying to figure out what it was. As she turned around to try and get a better idea of where this strange sound was coming from, a large, sticky, chocolate donut came soaring through the air and collided with Mistys mouth.

"Mmmph??!" She exclaimed in shock, as the donut forced itself into her mouth.

Nobody else noticed this as they were currently engrossed with Psyduck, so Misty swallowed the donut hastily to make her shock known. Before she could speak however another donut slammed into her mouth, and to her horror she felt her mouth open of its own accord and begin chewing the donut!

"Mrrrmphhh!" Exclaimed Misty again, now really afraid.

Donut after donut flew through the air toward her, each one finding its mark. Misty flailed her arms around in panic as she tried to bat the deliciously fattening confectioneries away; but to no avail.

"Hel-MFFFF! Oof!" She said feebly, as she was forced to eat donut after donut.

What happens next?
1421121111.title: The problem

choices: The gang finally notices Mistys predicament
14211211111.content:
And so nobody seemed to notice poor Mistys predicament as she was stuffed quicker and quicker. Misty was wide eyed as she was fed, flailing around in attempt to dodge the never ending sea of pastries; but it was no use.

"Mrrrph!! Hel-MMMFFF Meeshh ufffff! Urp! Helll-MFFFSHHH!!" She babbled, as more and more donuts were forced into her mouth and she was forced to eat them.

Misty attempted to move forward toward Ash, Brock and Pikachu to try and get their attention, but as she walked forward against the barrage of donuts the flow of pastries seemed to increase. Her progress forward was getting slower and slower as her delicate jaw worked of its own accord, frantically chewing and swallowing the fattening pastries. As she got a little closer to the gang she attempted to speak once more.

"Hel--Urp! Uhhh! Helll-- OOOFFF!!!" Each time she attempted to cry "Help!" another pastry was forced in her temporarily open mouth, which she was forced to chew and swallow. "Helll---MRRRPHHHH!?!?"

This time a huge chocolate cake smashed into her face, which caused her to fall back as it pushed itself forcefully into her mouth. She kept on stumbling backward as the momentum of the cake threw her off balance, and she finally came to a halt at the other end of the gym, falling onto a chair and being pinned there by the avalanche of food. Mistys head lolled from side to side and her eyes rolled as she frantically chewed and swallowed each fattening morsel completely against her own will. After a few minutes of relentless stuffing, Misty could feel her jean shorts getting a bit tighter as her stomach slowly expanded against them. This feeling seemed to get her brain working again, as before she was in a complete state of shock, not knowing what to do. The first thing she thought was how these incredibly fattening treats that she was being forced to consume were going to ruin her perfect delicate figure, and she couldn't help but shed a tear, which slowly rolled down her delicate cheek (a cheek which was constantly puffed up due to the sheer volume of food that was constantly in her mouth) at the thought of all her hard work being ruined. Misty groaned, starting to feel full from the relentless eating but seeing no end in sight. As she thought a huge chocolate cake loomed into view behind a row of sticky buns and her eyes widened in horror at the sight of it. How the hell am I going to eat that? She moaned in her own head, feeling her jeans digging into her stomach, which was bloating slowly outward in front of her very eyes. After the row of 10 buns Misty managed a burp and a groan before the huge cake descended on her. It slowly pushed itself into her face and once again her mouth worked of its own accord, munching vigorously at it like Misty hadn't eaten in months. After 5 minutes she finally finished it and she felt exhausted, her body drooped on her chair as she rubbed her uncomfortable stomach (which now looked very bloated indeed and rested on the top of her thighs) and she let out a very unladylike "BURRRPP!!".
To her horror she saw that the line of food was still approaching her.

"<Huff puff> noo moree <uhhh> too full <Urp!>" She whined weakly, breathing rather heavily "Please <hic!> stop <urhhh> can't take anymoreSHHMFFFFFF!" Her moaning was cut off by another donut being forced unceremoniously into her mouth.

What happens next?
14211211111.title: Nobody notices

choices: Brock and Ash manage to get the flow of food to slow down, but not stop
142112111111.content:
"Ouch!" Said Brock, rubbing the back of his head where something had just struck it with some force, "What was that?"

He scanned the ground for the guilty object and discovered, to his confusement, what appeared to be a button off a pair of jeans.

"What is it?" Asked Ash, equally perplexed.

"Its a button" Said Brock, "Off a pair of jeans I'd say... but whose jeans?"

The two knelt in silent thought, their brows furrowed comically as they tried to solve the mystery of the rogue button. The button had come from (or rather exploded off of) Mistys jean shorts, as they had been pushed well past capacity by her ever expanding stomach. Misty had noticed this so she desperately tried to get the two morons attention.

"-Oof- HELL -MRRRFFFF- Hellll -Ersshh- Helllll -Urp!- Meeshhh -URRFF!-" She wailed through mouthful after mouthful of fattening foods.

Her stomach was groaning, emitting gurgling sounds and sticking out a good 5-6 inches now and her jaw ached from constant chewing it was doing.

'Did you hear something?" Said Brock slowly.

"Where's Misty anyway?" Said Ash, and finally the two slowly turned around and their jaws dropped to the ground when they finally noticed Mistys predicament.

"MISTY!" Shouted Ash as he ran towards her, followed by Brock, pushing past the line of floating food.

The pair tried to bat the food away from her, but it was no use as the food just circled around and crashed into her mouth. Misty continued to chew frantically, but she was feeling weak now and she slid off her chair by the barrage of food onto the floor. The food continued to come as she lay on her back, forcing its way into her mouth and she let out a muffled, sorrowful moan. Brock and Ash watched Mistys once flat stomach, which already looked like she was passing her 6th month of pregnancy, slowly bloat out more and more causing her trademark yellow top to ride up it.

"What the hell do we do?!" Asked Brock in panic, as the two tried in vain to stop the food from getting to Misty.

What happens next?
142112111111.title: Finally noticing

choices: Dream Eater on Misty(to make Misty very hungry while she sleeps)
Hypnosis on Brock, Ash, and Pikachu(to hypnotize them into fattening Misty up)
1421121111111.content:
Then Pikachu decided to use thunderbolt on the incoming food. Most of the food was brunt and only Ashes remained. Thanks to Pikachu the amount of food decreased dramatically, but still kept going.

"Well that helped a little, but how are we going to stop it?" asked Ash to Brock. "I don't know. I've never seen anything like this. Though we could just use our Pokemon's attacks to stop the food like Pikachu did. I'm sure that if we keep it up the food will run out soon." said Brock as he threw some pokeballs, releasing his Pokemon. Ash did the same and both of them used their pokemon to stop the food.

After success with their Pokemon the food appeared to have stopped. Since no more food was coming in the room, Ash and Brock decided to return their Pokemon back to their pokeballs. Soon Misty got up from the chair she was pinned down in, of course she didn't feel well due to her full belly and her new weight. "I'm going to lie down for a little while then I'll work this weight off" "But Misty, aren't you a little curious about that incident with all that food?" said Brock "Nah, I bet it was all some silly plot by team rocket. Besides the food stopped didn't it. I need to relax after that, all that food made me tired." after slowly going upstairs Misty made it to her bed and began to drift to sleep.

Meanwhile Brock and Ash were still thinking about what just happened. "I'm still not sure it was a team rocket plot. Normally they're after Pokemon, so why fatten Misty up?" "We'll Misty has helped us defeat team rocket. Maybe it's revenge." "Nah, then why just Misty and not us? Team rocket probably would have tried to fatten you up first since you and Pikachu have sent them blasting off dozens of times before." while the two conversed they did not notice Psyduck.

Psyduck's eyes were glowing, he was still under Brock's accidental command. He goal was to fed Misty until he was returned to his pokeball. Now he needed a new strategy to get Misty to eat. That's why he was using a psychic attack, this new psychic attack will help accomplish his goal. He used...
1421121111111.title: It's not over yet

choices: Brock & Ash offer to help Misty lose the weight (whilst planning to sabotage it)
14211211111112.content:
Psyducks eyes glowed a dark scarlet colour as he stared at the backs of Brock and Ash, its intent to fatten up Misty still paramount in its mind. It was Ash who first noticed something strange was happening, and he was about to turn to Brock to voice his concerns about the strange glow his body now seemed to be emitting but as he opened his mouth to speak completely different words came out.

"I think Misty is incredibly underweight..." He said to Brock, who looked at him quizzically for a moment before he to was under Psyducks control.

"Yeah, dangerously so!" He replied excitedly.

"I think we need to fatten her up immediatley!" Said Ash, Psyducks own passion evident through his tone of voice.

Brock nodded quickly and the two sprinted from the room to carry out their very important mission.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------

Misty snored softly as she slept, shifting uncomfortably in the bed as the incredible amount of food she had just eaten digested. This process was actually being miraculously sped up by Psyduck, as it was visible to see her bloated stomach slowly shrink. The fat from the fattening foods she had consumed was moving evenly around her body, and this could also be seen, though it wasn't a huge gain (perhaps only about 3 pounds). Misty awoke with a start, perhaps on some level sensing that something was not quite right in her room. She saw Ash and Brock standing at the foot of the bed, with strangely purposeful looks on their faces. Brock and Ash both saw the slight extra weight on Mistys frame (which was most evident in her midsection which showed the slight bump of a belly and seemed slightly wider) but knew that it wasn't even close to being enough.

"Erm.. can I help you guys?" Asked Misty, a little worried.

What happens next?
14211211111112.title: Mind control

choices: Psyduck takes control of Mistys mind, causing her to enjoy the circumstances
Ash and Brock continue to feed Misty
142112111111121.content:
It was at this point that Misty noticed that her arms and legs had been tied to the posts of the bed. She struggled with them as Ash and Brock watched but they were tied very tight.

"What's going on?" Said Misty, her voice a mixture of annoyance and fear.

"Don't worry" Said Ash, "We're here to help!"

Misty didn't notice the strange tone to his voice and relaxed slightly, obviously expecting him to come over and loosen her restraints.

"I bet it was Team Rocket!" Fumed Misty, not noticing Brock also approaching her, "I'm getting so sick of those morons plan.. I mean do they never learn their lesso -MMMRRRFSHH?!?!-"

Misty was unable to finish her sentence because Brock had crammed a large jam donut into her mouth, which she was forced to chew and swallow.

"What the hell are you doing?! -MRRRRFSSSHHH!!- Stop it! -MRRRFFFFHH!!!??-" Exclaimed Misty as Ash joined in cramming cakes into her mouth.

"Me and Brock decided that your too skinny Misty!" Ash said happily, removing more treats from a sack he was carrying that Misty had failed to notice earlier.

"Yeah, we need to fatten you up a little" Said Brock child like enthusiasm as he stuffed a donut into her mouth.

"-MRRRFFFSH!!- I'm not even hungr -MRRRRFFFHH!- STOP IT NOWWW-MRFSHHHH!!!!?!?!- " Wailed Misty.

It was no use, as Brock and Ash were not even remotely paying attention to her. They just continued to smile stupidly as they crammed more and more into the poor young beauties mouth.

What happens next?
142112111111121.title: Fed in bed

1421121111111212.content:
No matter how much Misty attempted to complain about the situation Ash and Brock paid no attention and merely stuffed her faster and faster.

“Plea—OOF!! URRSHH!! MFFRSH!! Stop… Urp!” She babbled uselessly.

Pretty soon she wasn’t even given the opening to complain as her mouth was constantly occupied with the chewing and swallowing of whatever foodstuff Brock and Ash crammed into it. As the minutes ticked by Misty was beginning to tire from the frantic eating pace that she was being forced to keep up with and she shifted uncomfortably on the bed as her stomach expanded outward from the amount of food she had consumed. At the ten minute mark Misty uttered a low, fatigued burp and the top button popped off her jean shorts, allowing room for her swollen tummy to occupy. Brock and Ash smiled serenely at each other at the sight of Misty’s large food stuffed belly, which poked out from underneath her yellow top and stuck out a good ten inches. Misty’s eyelids were slowly drooping due to how exhausted she had become from the constant chewing and swallowing (not to mention how full she felt), and as they fell she saw something that only increased her terror.

What was it?
1421121111111212.title: Ash and Brock continue to feed Misty

choices: Psyduck allows Misty a break to allow the milkshake to digest
14211211111112121.content:
As Misty’s eyelids slowly drooped she saw Psyduck waddling into the room, carrying what appeared to be a large funnel. Pikachu and Togepi were bringing up his rear, each carrying large drums labeled ‘Bulk Up’ and it wasn’t difficult to put two and two together and realize what they planned. Psyducks influence was evident on the faces of both the Pokémon (same as Ash and Brock) as they both had rather vacant looks on their faces, though their intentions were very clear indeed.

“MRRFSH... noo... Oof! Urp!” Misty said feebly, but her voice was barely audible due to Ash and Brocks continual feeding.

Misty then passed out due to exhaustion from how much she had been forced to consume, which meant Ash and Brock were forced to stop stuffing the poor young beauty momentarily.

“Pikaa” Said Pikachu happily as he patted and rubbed Mistys taut belly which stuck out obviously and rose and fell with Mistys labored breaths.

Psyduck then approached the sleeping Misty and carefully inserted the end of the funnel into her mouth, as Ash and Brock watched with excitement. Next Togepi and Pikachu began making milkshakes from the weight gain powder, using a nearby blender and a host of other fattening ingredients (including chocolate, butter and lard). This took a little while, due to just how much they had (they had ten gallons of milkshake, each in gallon bottles), and by the time they’d finished Misty had digested the food from her previous feeding which had caused her bloated belly to shrink. The fat from the fattening stuffing session had spread around her body and the results were now quite obvious. All in all she’d probably gained about 7 pounds, which although wasn’t a massive amount was still visible on her. Misty had always had rather modest sized breasts (something she herself lamented), but now it was possible to see some slight growth there, as her once lose fitting shirt seemed a little snugger around her tits than usual. Her pot belly had also increased in size, and now stuck out about 5 inches (though because she lay on her back it wasn’t as visually obvious).

“She’s still too skinny” Said Ash, prodding Mistys small belly which felt softer than it had previously causing Misty to squirm in her sleep.

“Pikaaa” Said Pikachu happily, almost in response to Ash’s concerns and proceeded to lift the first gallon bottle of milkshake towards the funnel.

Misty’s cheeks bulged comically for a moment before she allowed the mixture to flow down her throat into her belly, and as she drank her stomach slowly started to bloat outward once more. Misty consumed the first milkshake in about 5 minutes, and was just able to let out a burp before Togepi took his turn and began pouring his own milkshake down the funnel which Misty once again swallowed without protest. Ash and Brock smiled happily at the sight of the expanding young beauty, who slept soundly as she was forced to consume more and more of the extremely fattening weight gain shakes. By the end of the 2nd milkshake Mistys stomach had almost doubled in size and looked like it couldn’t feasibly contain anymore though Pikachu continued regardless, poring milkshake number 3 down the funnel. Misty shifted uncomfortably on the bed, murmuring in her sleep as her stomach groaned in protest as yet another gallon of milkshake was forced into it. After the 3rd milkshake Mistys stomach had stretched a further 3 inches outward and had completely forced down the zip of her jean shorts, though her braces remained and were squeezing tightly against it.

What happens next?
14211211111112121.title: Extra help

choices: Misty wakes up and is horrified
142112111111121211.content:
Misty looked like she was approaching the latter stages of pregnancy, so large and rotund her full belly was now and Psyduck realized that the stuffed young beauty probably didn’t have much remaining space left. Pikachu and Togepi were just about to pour milkshake number 4 down the funnel when Psyduck raised his hand, indicating them to halt where there they stood, which they did so without complaint. Misty was groaning in her sleep, her full tummy obviously causing her much discomfort and emitting groaning noises of its own. Psyduck made a few swift hand gestures, like a conductor conducting a symphony, which commanded all present into new tasks without the need for words. Brock and Ash grabbed a tube labeled ‘massage oil’ and liberally applied it to Misty’s swollen midriff (a task that Brock in particular seemed to very much enjoy), lifting up her shirt slightly to make sure the whole area was covered. Next Pikachu and Togepi climbed up onto the bed and began the treatment, slowly and softly massaging Misty’s full tummy which caused her to moan with pleasure in her sleep. As well as being extremely enjoyable for Misty, the process also had the added effect of helping Misty to digest what she had just consumed at an extremely fast rate. Her belly was noticeably shrinking with each rub and once again the extra fat could be seen slowly spreading throughout her body. Misty’s once so slim and skinny body was slowly swelling up with the added fat, most notably her breasts which had perhaps started a low size B/ large A but were now approaching large B cup. After five minutes everything had been digested and all the fat from the milkshakes had spread throughout her body. Before all the stuffing she had endured Misty had been extremely skinny for her height (5’2” and about 100 pounds), with barely any breasts or an ass to speak of. Now all the weight had been redistributed however Misty looked much healthier, now weighing in around 125 pounds. She wasn’t exactly overweight, though she had definitely developed some womanly curves now and there was a bump of a pot belly forming. Her clothes were obviously getting a bit on the tight size also, as they were a very low size to begin with and were obviously not enjoying trying to confine Misty’s growing form. Brock was practically drooling at the sight of her, as Psyduck clapped his hands and the two Pokemon got back to work. Milkshakes 4 and 5 went down with ease, Misty barely stirring as she swallowed the fattening shakes without protest. By the 7th shake Misty’s stomach was groaning again so the treatment was repeated, though with Brock and Ash administering the belly massage this time.

“Uhhh… URRRP!!!” Exclaimed Misty in her sleep as she was massaged

Both Brock and Ash looked incredibly happy as they massaged the growing form of their best friend as she slumbered. Misty had packed on a further ten pounds after this, putting her new weight at around 140 pounds and now it was really beginning to show. Her clothes were extremely constricting now, with her top and jeans becoming pretty much skin tight. 143211.content:
It was an atypically boring afternoon on Mars, The war effort against earth was moving painfully slow, and as such, there was little to do on the red planet, especially for its ruler. The slim, sleek, ink-colored Queen of the Martians was sitting on her throne (a large, plush ruby-red chair) with a glazed expression on her face, drumming her fingers on the arm-rest of her her throne.

         "The Earthlings are doing nothing worthwhile, we aren't under any threat, and Dodgers hasn't been around ANY of our territories for DAYS. I can't think of any other worthwhile planets to invade, so what is there to do?" The Queen slumped in her throne.

         Commander X-2 (aka Marvin the Martian) gazed upon his bored and forlorn Queen with (unrequited) adoration. It bothered him to see his Queen in such "turmoil", so his mind raced to find something to do. Suddenly, a lightbulb lit up above his head.

         "Commander, do you naturally produce antiquated technology above your head?" inquired the Queen.

         "Sometimes, my Queen." replied X-2, "If I may make a suggestion as to how to alleviate your boredom, perhaps you could try some of the natural delicacies of the planets we've conquered?"

         Tyr'ahnee raise her eyebrow, was silent for a few moments, then nodded. "I'll go fetch some from the cooks, then." She began to rise from her seat, but then X-2 softly lowered her back down. "No, it's all right, my Queen, I shall retrieve it for you" X-2 urged, "Please, stay and be comfortable." He then scurried off, and soon returned with a cart with several alien dishes of varying colors, shapes and sizes on top.

         Tyr'ahnee plucked a small, purple, golfball-sized sponge-like foodstuff from a platter and gently placed it into her mouth (which, for the sake of simplicity, is where the human mouth is. The reason that earthlings could never see martians as having mouths is due to the insides of their mouths being the same color as their skin). After a moment of chewing, the Queen decided that she liked the little purple sponges. In fact, she liked them quite a lot. In a fit of sudden, insatiable gluttony that is so prominent in WG literature, she grabbed more sponges and chowed down on them. She then proceeded to munch on the other foodstuffs on the cart.

         "Oh, these are all so wonderful!" exclaimed the Queen, "I just hope that something interesting happens soon. I can't stand being bored for this long! I might just sit here eating all day..."

         Only noticing that the Queen was at least happy when she was eating, X-2 merely shook his head and said "In case something doesn't happen, I'll be here to keep you comfortable and entertained!"

         In truth, nothing really happened, and as time passed, the Queen changed after just lazing around, being pampered by X-2 and her subjects for so long...

         It is now..

"Leela's temper is completely out of control!" Said the Professor, pacing back and forth in anger.

"But what can we do about it Professor?" Said Hermes, at a loss.

"'What can we do about it Professor?' Indeed" Said the Professor cryptically, and Hermes stared at him expecting him to carry on, but he didn't

Just then Amy (who was eavesdropping at the door) entered.

"I have an idea, if you'd like to hear it?" She said carelessly whilst brushing a stray hair from her beautiful face.

"Go on..." Said Hermes

"Well" Said Amy, "Seems to me that if Leela wasn't so mobile, she wouldn't be able to utilize her fighting skills as much, and would therefore break less things... Also if she lost her finely toned body it would destroy her, so I think that would be a suitable punishment don't you think?"

"Would it be possible to make a device which could cause Leela to want to eat whenever she feels anger?" Asked Amy.

"Hmm" Said the Professor thoughtfully, "I see no reason why it wouldn't be" He concluded.

"Thats a good idea" Piped in Hermes, "As it also means we won't have to constantly enforce any punishments ourselves!"

Amy couldn't stop herself grinning as her plan came to fruition... This would teach Leela a lesson she thought.

"I'll set to work immediately" Said the Professor, "It shouldn't take me long"

And so the Professor pottered away to work on the device and Amy and Hermes went about their day as normal. Later that day, the crew of Planet Express were sitting around the loading area talking and joking. Bender and Fry had resumed their game of strip poker, and the outcome was pretty much the same as before; that being Fry was losing badly. Leela and Amy were talking about their plans for the evening, and Amy was doing a good job at hiding her distaste of Leela. Suddenly the Professor strode into the room and everybody stopped talking.

"Leela, will you please come here" He said calmly, and Leela approached looking confused.

When she reached him the Professor clipped something which resembled a shock collar around her neck. Leela didn't fight it, but still looked confused.

"Whats this?" She said suspiciously, as she felt the cold metal of the device against her satin soft skin.

"That my dear" Said the Professor, "Is going to prevent your constant angry behaivour! Everytime you think an angry thought, or feel any kind of negative emotion it will send an impulse to your brain making you want to eat, rather than resort to violence! The amount it makes you want to eat will coincide with how bad the thought or emotion is!"

"Whatt?!?!" Yelled Leela, aghast at what was being done to her.

As soon as she finished her exclamation however Leela felt the device around her neck vibrate softly, and she suddenly groaned stroking her flat stomach.

"Sooo hungry" She said and as the rest of the crew watched in amazement, Leela ran to the food dispenser in the corner and began randomly hammering buttons on it.

Amy grinned broadly as the first thing that came from the machine (a huge burger with fries and a massive milkshake) was set upon by the ravenous Leela. Leela ate the burger furiously, finishing it in 5 bites despite its huge size, and then proceeding to demolish the fries. After the fries she stopped for a second to let out a loud *BURRRRP!!!* and proceeded to chug the entire milkshake without stopping for breath. She then moved on to the next thing which came from the machine, which was a huge chocolate cake, and began shoving handful after handful (she didn't bother to cut it, so she just tore it off with her hands) into her greedy mouth.

"As you can see" Said the Professor, "Everytime you get angry you will be forced to quench that negativity with food! And if you want to keep that hard earned figure of yours, I suggest you overcome your anger problem quickly"

As Leela heard this she couldn't stop herself feeling angry at what the Professor was doing to her, and so she felt the device vibrate again and her hunger increase.

"God dam- URRRRP!!!" Came Leelas response, before she returned her attention to the food dispenser.

After the cake came a big box of krispy kream donuts, which Leela munched vigorously. Amy couldn't stop herself laughing as she watched Leela make a complete pig of herself, and Fry and Bender also joined in. Once Leela had finished the ten donuts that the box contained, she rubbed her full looking tummy and groaned, suddenly feeling full. She managed to control the rage she was feeling with some effort and returned to the group with a forced smile on her face.

"How <hic!> long do I have to wear this for Professor? <ERRP!>" She said through gritted teeth.

"Well I'll let Amy decide that" He said as Amy grinned menacingly at Leela, "It was her idea after all!"

Leela eyed Amy hopefully, but upon seeing the expression of her face felt a pang of worry.

Her stomach, which used to be toned (almost to the point of a washboard stomach), was now a rather noticeable soft pot belly, with small love handles which were accentuated beautifully by the skin tight outfit she was currently wearing. Her hips were wider (not amazingly so, but enough to notice), her ass more padded (as it was rather previously rather small) and her thighs were meatier. Suddenly Leela heard a noise in the darkness (which brought her out of her day dream, as she was unhappily examining the new dimensions of her larger body).

144212.content:
The Mall of New New York
Where all your shopping needs are non refundable.

Amy dismisses the barrage of overly aggressive perfume samplers and gaudy ads of clothing trends. She keeps her pace constant throughout the expansive mall. Getting distracted from her goal is something she couldn’t afford right now. Time is extremely of the essence, "Smeez. You take one nap and you're already behind all of the latest trends."

In the middle of the mall lobby is a kiosk labeled Trend Trove. This kiosk shines like a beacon of precious information to Amy, “Trend Trove! The only place besides the internet to know what’s trending!"

“Excuse me, ma’am,” A gruff voice said from her side, “Could you step away from the exposition cube?” Next to Amy is a cube that gives off strange scientific waves, “Sorry, I just need to get to the kiosk to understand what trending...”

Amy approaches the kiosk owner who swished away her trendy haircut from her face, "If you're here for the fidget spinners they're in the dumpster in a box labeled 'LAME'."

"What? No. I'm here to ask about the latest trend. I would use my eyePhone, but it died six minutes ago."

"Well. I can't say anything about you since saying ‘my phone died’ stopped being cool four minutes ago."

"Phew."

The trendy person swiveled to the computer, "Let’s take a look. You should be up to date. You do look pretty hip...except for that!"

Amy turned to where the trendy person’s finger pointed. Behind her a bunch of overweight women all varying in species and race wearing normal clothes shuffled through the mall. Everyone in the mall stopped, their jaws agape at the moving epitome of trendiness.

"Ha,” Amy snickered, “Looks like someone forgot to tie down the Macy's Day Parade blimps."

"Those over sized women aren't blimps...okay maybe they are, but they're the new trend setters."

"Trend setters? For what?"

"Being big! Haven't you heard fat is in?"

"No. My phone died."

"Ugh. That's so four minutes ago."

The saleswoman pulls out a stick of butter and starts eating it, "Judging from the way you look, you're very behind...and old."

"Aw, schleez. If I don't do something, everyone is going to start calling me old!"
144212.title: The Trends of Tomorrow...Tomorrow!

1442121.content:
Back at Planet Express, a pile of hot dogs we find Amy in the employee break room gorging on a pile of hot dogs each topped beautifully with onions and ketchup slowly diminish with each passing second. Her recently acquired ambition of getting up on the latest trend of being big had thrown out any fear of returning to her fat self. In fact, she has encouraged two employees, Fry and Bender, to encourage her, "Go Amy Go! Go Amy Go! Go Amy Go!"

"What in the hell is this infernal racket?", hollered Professor Farnsworth ambling in.

"We're supporting Amy! She's gonna be huge with us as her glorified cheerleaders!" said Fry.

The Professor shook his saggy, wrinkly head, "Fry. You know you two already come off as bumbling nincompoops...hell you'll be fine. Amy, I may have just the invention you need." Amy wiped off the leftover ketchup from her mouth, "Invention? Like what?"

Professor Farnsworth's eyes smiled behind his thick glasses, "Come and I'll show you!"

In the lab, everyone gathers around the company table, absent of Hermes, Leela, and Zoidberg. "Lookie what I have here," His wrinkly old fingers holds up a black stylish ring.

"What is it, Professor?"

"Aah. I was just waiting for one of you to predictably ask that. This is a weight changer. Just like the one my extremely brief girlfriend had. Remember? The time we all got three hundred dollars for some reason.”

“Oh yeah.” Everyone said in unison.

“Except this has the power to make you any weight you desire."

The landing bay doors opened to allow the Planet Express spaceship land. From the extended stairs Leela, Hermes, and Scruffy descend the stairs. "Hey. Weren't we supposed to be on some sort of delivery?” Bender asked Fry.

“I dunno. This was just more interesting to us I guess.”


The three joined the others in the workshop. Leela is the only one to speak, “Why is it that I take Hermes and Scruffy the Janitor on a mission that everything goes right, but whenever I take you two boneheads we go through twenty-two minutes of B.S. each week.”

“I dunno. There’s just more exciting things to do I guess.”

Leela rolled her eye, “Anyhow what’s going on here.”
“Amy is going to try out my new experiment to gain weight to be cool, hip and trendy. Like the young folk!” The Professor explained.

Amy stepped forward, “I am the young folk.”

Leela nodded her head disapprovingly, "Look, Amy. If you truly want to gain weight then you have to do it the way God intended. By sitting on your butt and eating artificial junk food."

"Or,” The Professor interjects, “You could take the simple way and simply put on the Bell bigger to get what you want quickest. What could go wrong with that?"


Amy looks between both the Ring and Leela, "I choose...I choose..."

He'd been working on it in his room as opposed to his lab so he could get to bed quicker and easier should he need to, but he fell asleep while he was working anyway.

After Dexter had left for school, his mother began her daily cleaning routine. She vacuummed and mopped, and soon began to dust. She made her way to Dexter's room where she began to dust as usual. "Oh Dexter..." she sighed, followed by a alugh. "He left one of his silly little Junior Lab Experiements (A cover story given to her by none other than Dexter himself many times) sitting out again!" With every movement or waddle it jiggle for what seemed like forever. She was as wide as she was tall. Her mouth hung open, but no screams came out.

145222121.content:
There was no better way to say it. We were stranded. It wasn't like we never had this problem before, but usually these things were accident's such as a flat tire or an empty fuel tank. This time however, it was Shaggy's fault. I think I might be getting ahead of my self so let's go back to the beginning.
My name is Velma Dinkley and together with my friends Frederick Jones, Daphne Blake, we run a detective agency known as Mystery inc. the agency started out as just the three of us until our friend Norville Rogers (known to us as Shaggy because of his unkempt appearance) came to us looking for help finding his dog, a great dane named Scooby doo. Our always seemed to follow the same format as if the entire criminal was copying each other. In every case we would spend time running from a desperate criminal who would be willing to kill us in order to protect his secrets. you'd think all that running would keep a person's weight down, but the case that follows had recently packed a great deal of weight onto my once 110 lb frame.
As I said before we were stranded. a few days before this case caught our attention Shaggy attended a poker game at his neighbor's house at which he gambled away all our transportation money (the money used to keep the mystery machine in a drivable condition). For those of you who were wondering what Shaggy was doing at a poker, how he had possession of our car money and how I know so much about it the answers are simple: 1.Shaggy was attending a get toghter his neighbors were hosting in honor of their 10th wedding anniversary, and a couple of the gets had decided to play a few hands of poker and Shaggy had agreed to join to the game. Every few weeks we alternate possession of that money so we can keep an eye on it. and 3. I was there, the invitation had stated that shaggy was to bring a date to the party and doing him a favor (while my skills with boys aren't so great, when it comes to girls Shaggy fares much worse) I agreed to accompany him. Needless to say he lost all the money with a bunch of lousy cards . The next day we ( the gang) were taking a ride to "The Malt Shop" the best soda counter in Coolsville and one of the only ones remaining anywhere. luckily we each had enough money saved up to order and pay for more than four weeks worth of food from there.
now halfway there we happened to to run out of gas.
"Shaggy," Fred said to our lanky friend who was peacefully reading a comic book in the back of the van, "hand me that gas money we need to fill up."
Shaggy started fumbling through both pockets in his brown jeans desperately trying looking for the you know what.
"Shaggy," I asked him in an exasperated tone, "do you remember what you were doing last night?"
Daphne, who was busy brushing her wavy red hair looked up from her compact mirror and faced me.
"What did he do last night?, anything we should know about," she asked.
"What he did was gamble away all our travel and car money in poker game," I said.
Fred just looked at him and Groaned.Shaggy was going have get all that money back.
Daphne and Fred had no idea I was doing this but the revelation that one of my best friends had a bit of a gambling addiction had gotten my nerves a bit rattled and i started munch on Shaggy's stash (a rather poorly hidden one) of "Scooby Snacks".
By the we arrived at the malt shop I had eaten about 75% of The stash and surprisingly i was still hungry despite the staggering amount of calories contained in each box of Scooby Snacks and my knowledge that some of the ice cream concoctions and others items on the menu in the soda shop had more than three times that amount.

After adjusting my glasses I headed into my room to read. That evening the doorbell rang and knowing it was the gang I went out to join them.When I got to the front door I was a little worried that I'd get stuck (having just become an ssbbw over night) i was surprised to see I could still fit.
When the gang saw me, they were dumbfounded by my change. they just said nothing as I squeezed in to the mystery machine next to Daphne my belly squishing against the dashboard. We arrived at a small abandoned farmhouse in the middle of nowhere. The door was impossible to open having rusted shut so we had to get in through the window, halfway through I got stuck and Shaggy and Scooby were still outside. after managing to pull me through Fred suggested we split up and search for clues. Daphne of course went with Fred and I went with Shaggy and Scooby.
We walked (well, I waddled) over to a dark room on the east end of the house. As soon as we reached the doorway Shaggy stopped short and I bumped into him with my belly bouncing him into the room Scooby had no choice but to follow. I turned on my flashlight and looked around until I came across a newspaper with an interesting headline: Dr. O. Besser wanted by police. Before I could read on Shaggy and Scooby whimpering. I turned around as far as my weight would allow to see what the trouble was when I saw the glowing figure of an old man who matched the photo in the newspaper. he started chasing me and the boys. we tried to behind a cabinet in the back of the room but unfortunately my flab gave us away. It took us a while to lose him but we finally rejoined the rest of the gang.
Fred reached into his pocket and pulled out a slip of paper on it was printed an invoice for the sale of a large number of weight gain pills and powders. I handed him the newspaper.
"It's time we set a trap," he said, "We need someone to act as bait."
"Like not me," whined Shaggy, "The last time I acted as bait the spook almost threw me off the roof of a skyscraper."
"That's right," said Daphne, "he would have fallen too had Mr. Madison and Mr. Ungar not rescued him in time."
"You're safe this time Shag, the ghost has no interest in you or Scooby, he's only interested in girls who are rather heavyset, so Velma will act as bait and You and Scooby will protect her."
"like huh," answered Shaggy, by this point he was confused.
"rhat are rou ralking about," asked Scooby.
"If this ghost is who we think it is, then his one twisted individual," Fred replied
