145222211211.content:
“Your both going to be testing some new health products from acme labs.” Wile explained as he pulled out some paper work for them to fill out.

“What kind of health products?” Babs asked out of curiosity.

“Various weight gain formulas.”

“Weight gain! We are going to gain weight?” Fifi asked in shock.

“Yes, you will both be given an injection of a special formula that slows down your metabolism and makes it easier for you both to gain weight.”

“I don’t know, I don’t think I like the idea of getting fat.” Babs said starting to think this is a bad idea. “Besides why would people want to gain weight?”

“Oh many reasons. People who are dangerously to thin, Japan can use some of these formulas to help sumo wrestlers in training gain weight, many reasons. And don’t worry about getting fat at the end of the experiment acme has a formula that should instantly take the weight you gained right off.” Wile assured them.

After talking to Wile for a few minutes, the two decided to do it. Wile then handed them both a pen and show them the paperwork they needed to sign.

“Ok sign here, here ,here, right here, don’t forget about right here, there, down here,….”

Two hours, 300 contracts and documents later.

“…here, and here, and finally here.” He said pointing to the line at the bottom of the last page. “There that wasn’t so bad now was it?”

“I think I ave a hand cramp” Fifi said rubbing her right hand.

“Ok on the 1st day of summer vacation you two will be given an injection of the formula I told you about earlier and then you then be driven to a house one mile away from the city of Acme falls. In the house will be special equipment and the formulas to be tested.” Wile explained while putting the paperwork away.

“Acme falls! That’s a huge tourist town! They have shopping malls, luxury spas, movie theaters, an amusement park...” Babs said excited about where they are going.

“And many different restaurants. Acme labs we give you both credit cards to be used only for food and clothes. Any other things you want to buy you will have to paid for with the money you get from your paychecks from Acme labs.” Wile informed them

“So are we going to be ze only ones living in ze house?”

“No, there will be two other students there to monitoring your conditions and assist you during this experiment.” Wile picked up his briefcase and got ready to leave. “Now you two need to inform your friends and families about where you are going to be this summer and start getting ready to go to Acme falls. Have a nice day ladies.” Wile then left.

1452222112112.content:
The 1st day of summer vacation had arrived. Babs and Fifi showed up at the looniversity at 8:00 am with their luggage as they were told to. Babs then noticed something. Fifi was wearing a shirt and skirt much like Babs outfit but in a green color.

“Fifi it’s been a long time since I’ve seen you wear clothes. Why the sudden interest in wearing them?”

“Well I thought cince I am going to be gaining weight, my breast and butt would grow big and I might want to cover zem up.” Fifi explained with a blush on her face.

Babs thought about what Fifi said and then a blush went across her face too.

“Oh yeah, their going to get pretty big aren’t they.” Babs said as she looked down at her own breast.

“Anyway, did Shirley want to come with us?” Fifi asked hoping to change the subject.

“No, she said she was going to visit some relatives this summer.”

A few minutes later a white van with the Acme labs logo on the side of it showed up. A man wearing a white lab coat stepped out and started to load their luggage into the back of the van. Babs and Fifi got in back seat of the vehicle and sat down. The man in the lab coat then got in and drove them to their first destination.

“So where are we headed to first?” Babs asked the driver.

“First were going to Acme labs, where they are going to give you two a full examination and then they are going to give you both an injection of formula “BBW-19”. After that I will then be taking you to the house in Acme falls. I’m Marco by the way, nice to meet you.” He said as he turned back to them and shook their hands. He then quickly turned back to driving the vehicle.

Half an hour later, they arrived at Acme labs. Marco dropped them off at the entrance and the two went inside. Inside the doctors had them go to a locker room and change into some hospital gowns. They then conducted some tests on them. Checking their heart rate, blood pressure, how much they weighted, etc, etc. After conducting many tests and taking notes, they were then taken to separate rooms.

“So I guess this is where I get my shot right?” Babs asked as she jumped onto the table.

The nurse walked in and locked the door. “Yes it is.” The nurse said as she put the key away and reached into the closet.

Babs looked over that the door. “Um, why did you lock the door?” She asked with a hint of worry in her voice.

“So you can’t escape.” The nurse said as she pulled out a huge syringe filled with a blue liquid. “And yes, in case your wondering this is going to hurt!”

Babs stood against the wall in terror. “Can…can we talk about this?” She asked hoping to stop what was coming next.

Meanwhile on the other side of the planet, near the peak of Mt. Kilimanjaro, two mountain climbers are nearing the peak of the mountain.

“Professor I think we should turn back!” The young man yelled out to the man in front of him. “It’s to dangerous!”

The professor looked back at his colleague. “We can’t now! We’ve come to far to stop now to…” Before the professor could finish his sentence, he was startled by a loud noise.

“YEEEEOOOWWW!”

The two men stopped and looked around trying to find the source of the sound.

“What the devil was that?”

“I don’t know sir...but what ever it is I think it’s in pain.”

Meanwhile back in Acme acres, Babs exit’s the room rubbing her butt in pain. She walked back to the locker room where her and Fifi had changed into the hospital. As she entered the locker room, she saw Fifi standing there rubbing her butt in pain too.

“You too huh?”

“Le ouch.” she answered in a pain.

The two then started to change back in to their clothes. As they were getting dressed, Fifi noticed something different.

“Babs”

“Yeah Fifi ?”

“Do your clothes feel… tighter?”

“Yes! Not only that, I don’t think they fit anymore!” Babs said as she struggled to pull her skirt on.

RIP!

Babs quickly pulled her skirt off and examined it. It had a large rip down the back of it.

“Well that just great.” She said as she threw she skirt on the ground.

“LE EEK!”

“Fifi! What’s wrong?”

Babs ran towards Fifi to find her looking into a full length mirror. Babs looked into the mirror and got the same shock Fifi did. They had gained weight. It looked like they both had gained about 200 pounds.

-Two Days Later -

Montana Max sat at his table getting ready to eat breakfast. The long table was filled with all sorts of food, even food that wasn't for breakfast like cake and whole turkey. To Max this is how he was supposed to eat, choose what he want and what he didn't would be thrown out. Quickly he grabbed what he wanted unto his plate as it grew into a large pile of food. Rubbing his hands and licking his lip eying his selection he was ready to eat, but before he could take a bite he felt a small quake. He quickly looked around to see where the quake came from. Not finding anything, he shrugged his shoulders and when back to his meal. Another quake came stronger than the last one, making his pile of food to crumble a little. He looked around him again as another quake came, stronger still. This time he looked at his glass of milk seeing it ripple with every quake, getting more turbulent as the quakes became stronger. Soon he started to hear muffled trumps with the quakes. Max then rushed to a window as his whole house began to shake. "What's going on out there?!" he yelled. Looking though the window he couldn’t see anything at first, but eventually he looked at the edge of his property his jaw dropping to the ground at what he saw. Coming over the hill was the biggest quivering mass of purple he had ever seen. He watched in shock and fear was this mass approach his home.

Moving slowly Fifi had a hard time walking given how big she had gotten. No longer was she the petite fat skunk that allowed Montana Max to steel her lover, now she was a literal mountain of a woman ready to protect what she loved, eyes full of determination. She was going to get her pig no matter what, even if she had to destroy everything in her path. To make sure that she didn't accidentally squish Babs while she walked toward Max's mansion Babs stood on top of Fifi's shoulder, although it was kinda hard to stay still given how much fat she had that Babs sink in quite a bit while everything jiggled.

At this point Fifi didn't get fatter as more she got bigger, much bigger. She now stood five times taller from how tall she was from her feast from the factory. Her general shape stayed the same given a bit bigger boobs and butt. Every part of her quaked and shook, even after she stopped moving. This time around she was wearing clothes, although makeshift bra and skirt made from a bit top tent.

Eventually Fifi got to the doors of the mansion huffing and puffing, it was exhausting work to walk. Babs hopped down Fifi and to the door, ringing the doorbell. They waited for a few minutes but no one answered. Babs rang again and after a few minutes more the door opened.

"Yes?" answered a butler.

"We want Montana Max to return Hampton back or I'll be forced to use this wrecking ball on his house." Babs said as she pointed to the mass of Fifi as Fifi waved down at the butler with a smile.

The butler nervously looked up at the giant skunk and pulled at he collar, "I'll see if the master is home." He quickly closed the door leaving Babs and Fifi to wait again.

After a another minute the door opened just a crack, this time it was Montana Max poking his head out.

"What do you want!" Max yelled.

"You know exactly what we want, and if you don't want my friend to remodel you door you better do as we say."

"Hey hey hey, we're all gentlemen here, no need to do anything rash," Max said as he stepped out of the door looking nervous.

"Ok then, how about this, a competition."

"A competition? What kind of competition?" Max perked up.

"A sumo match between your sumo and my friend."

Max began to rub his chin thinking. Soon dollar signs appeared in his eyes as a thought came to his head. Quickly shook his head to remove the dollar signs from his eyes, he looked back Babs with a smile, "alright then, you got yourself a deal. Come back tomorrow at ten, I'll take care of everything."

"No funny business," Babs said strongly.

"I promise on my grandma's grave," Max replied with an innocent smile as a halo appeared above his head. He then stretched out this hand to Babs. Babs looked at it for a bit before quickly taking it.

Max, with a innocent smile, watched as Babs and Fifi walked away creating small earthquakes as Babs kept looking back to him. As soon as the two was out of sight Max's smile turned wicked and his halo turned into horns, "Ha, what a fool, my grandma isn't dead, hahaha. She would be so proud of me. With this deal not only will I make sure I win but I'll make a killing, hahaha"

1452222121122111111111111111111111.content:
The two crashed into each other with a loud boom from there colliding fat. Fifi tried to get a good grip on the sumo but the sumo already had the upper hand, or more accurately lower hand as he was under Fifi's breasts with his arms wrapped around her belly and his hands grabbing onto her belt. She tried to remove him from her but because her fat getting in her way and he was too strong she couldn't do anything as he began to push her to the edge of the ring. Then to Fifi's horror she began to lose balance as she could feel the weight of her butt pull her back. She tried to fight it, trying to step forward but if she tried to move her feet she would loose balance from the sumo pushing on her. But it was a losing battle as she lost balance and fell down on her butt with great boom outside of the ring. The crowd roared as the fist match finished.

Fifi sat there her determination all drained from her as she watch the sumo bowed to the crowd soaking in his victory. She knew that the sumo was strong but not this strong as her thoughts began to fill with doubt if she could win this fight. Fifi then began to feed something bouncing up from her butt up to her face. Coming into view she saw it was Babs hopping on her.

"Moi couldn't stop him, his too strong. Moi didn't know what to do Babs. Moi though moi had this but moi didn't know anymore. Moi is unsure if we can rescue moi Hampton." Fifi started to ramble as she eyes began to water. Before Fifi could continued Babs grabbed Fifi's lips shutting her up.

"If you quit now then Montana Max wins and who knows what he'll do to Hampton and you don't what that don't you?"

"No," Fifi responded still sounding sad.

"And can you life with yourself if you just gave up like that, after one lost?!"

"No," Fifi now sound more upbeat.

"And what would Hampton think if he found out you gave up on him?!"

"NO," Fifi said angrily.

"Then you have your man to save, and if you want to save Hampton and not a quitter then you get your sorry butt up and fight!

Confidence began to fill Fifi as she slowly got up, fill with anew confidence and passion to faced the sumo ready to win this round.

They both got really and sized each other up readying themselves up for the next round. The bell rang and again the two walls of fat crashed into each other with great force. This time however Fifi stuck out her belly so it would be more harder for the sumo to grab her belt. While the sumo tried to reach over her belly she used all of her weight to lean forward and let gravity take its course. The sumo realize this and tried to move out of the way but it was too late as he lost footing and went down landing on his back.

The crowd cheered again as the second round went to Fifi. Fifi was now on top of the sumo her legs off the ground having a difficult time getting up. She had to roll off him landing on her back creating a 6 on the richter scale. It took several people to help each of the bloated masses to get to there feet. Montana Max just smile wickedly looking at the two whales getting back up, not worried about Fifi's resent victory.

Fifi and the sumo slowly but surely lumbered their way back into position ready for their final round. The arena became quite as the anticipation of the final round grew almost became unbearably. The mass of blubber look into each other eyes, ready to put everything they have into this final fight, ready to give it their all, ready to win.

DING

The two mountains bellies slammed into each other with a focus so great that it created such a shock wave that several people from the audience was blown away. Their hands slamming into each other's hands grabbing hard as to not let the other escape as they both pushed as hard as they could into each other. The ground on which they stood shook as their feet slowly began to sink into the sand. Their whole bodies quaked as both tried to shove the other to the ground, their bodies shifting every which way but their feet locked in place refusing to budge.

The crowd cheered the two on while unbeknownst to everyone Montana Max sneaked away from his table and slithered his way behind the audience's seats, and upon arrival he took out a small remote from his suit pointing it toward the sumo and with a evil grin he pressed the button.

Right away a pair of small jet engines popped out of the sumo's belt. The engines then spun to life thrusting the sumo slowly forward as the cheering crowd hid the sound of the engines. Fifi tried with all of her might to fight back the now forward moving sumo but in the end it was for nothing as she was pushed back all the way to the edge of the ring, then over it causing her to fall slowly down onto her butt with a thunderous boom.

As soon as Fifi fell Max quickly pushed the button again, making the jets retract back to the the belt without anyone noticing and rushed back his table ringing the bell stating the match was over.

The crowd cheered louder at such a spectacle while the sumo looked at his fallen opponent his face in shadows. Fifi on the other hand was heartbroken, this was her best chance for rescuing her Hampton from Montana Max's clutches and she had failed. All of her hard work, all of that gorging and stuffing herself with food till it hurt was all for not.

Max quickly made it to the center of the ring with a great triumphant smile, "Ladies and gentlemen, we have a winner, Dekkai Hara!"

The audience cheered loudly for the unresponsive sumo as he hid his face in shadow while Babs hopped up to Fifi's face consulting her. Max then took out a large golden belt with the words written on it reads "Winner". Then a lever popped up next to him and he began cranking it as a platform under his feet began to rise. The platform rose until Max was face to face with the sumo, presenting him with the golden belt.

"You dishonor me, Max-san," the sumo stated coldly while his face was still covered in shadow.

"What?" Max said loosing the smile on his face.

"That was an dishonorable win, Max-san."

"What are you talking about, y-you won fair and square," Max said nervously as he started to sweat.

"I cannot accept a victory like that, it would dishonor my sport, it would dishonor my country, it would dishonor my family, and most of all it would dishonor me." The sumo said as the shadow dissipated showing a face of rage.

"Listen here, you work for me and what I say *urk*" Max choked as the sumo grabbed him making his eyes bulge out.

"I no longer work for a dishonorable boy like you anymore." The sumo then taking his other hand and crushed Max into a ball. Extending his palm Max laid in the middle of his hand blinking a few times before the sumo flicked him away through the tent and over Acme.

He watched Max fly away for a bit before turning his gaze to the fat skunk. He then bent down to pick up the golden belt and show it to Fifi.

"You are the winner, skunk-chan."

Fifi face was in her plump hands crying when she heard the sumo spoke. She slowly lifted her head up to look at the sumo seeing him presenting her the belt, her eyes twinkled seeing the belt realized what this meant.

"Oh merci beaucoup!" Fifi said joyfully as she slowly got to her feet and grabbed belt, and the crowd went wild.

"Very easily excitable crowd aren't they," said Babs.
1452222121122111111111111111111111.title: Battle of the Whales 3

14522221211221111111111111111111111.content:
CRASH.

A wall of white fur busted through the front door of Montana Max's mansion. Debris fell from the surrounding wall over Fifi's stomach as she slowly waddled herself into the hallway followed by Babs stay a safe distance from the love bound skunk.

"Hamton, moi amour, I'm here to rescue you!" Fifi declared into the mansion. The place was silent except for the wind howling through the hallway.

"I don't think his going to just be walking freely about. We better start searching, his has to be in one of these room." Babs said.

Both of them split up and started to look into each room calling for Hamton. Babs was zipping to each door down the corridor calling out into each room before quickly going to the next one, while Fifi bent down, maneuver onto her bell squishing her fat every which way just to get her hand to a door. Not knowing her own strength she accidentally pulling the doors and the wall around them out when she opened them then. Feeling a bit embarrassed she called out for Hamton before putting the door back when she received no answer.

Over the course of a few hour they finish searching the whole mansion not finding Hamton anywhere. Fifi and Babs stood in the hallway from where they started, Babs was thinking where Max would put Hamton while Fifi held a sandwich as big as she was fill with everything she found in Montana Max's kitchen, which included foods like cakes, fruits, meats, and every canned food imaginable all stuffed between two giant slices of bread. Fifi got hungry when she worried, and she figured the Max would be fine with sharing "some" food with her.

"Where could Max be keeping Hamton?" Babs thought out loud taping her feet. Babs turned to Fifi just as Fifi opened her mouth to eat her sandwich, "Did Max say anything about what he was going to do with Hamton?"

Fifi pause before her sandwich and began to think. "Oui! He said Hamton was going to be put in a underground pig race!" Fifi stated.

Babs scratching her head, "How are we going to get down stairs?"

As Babs thought Fifi looked at her sandwich thinking about Hamton. Then a thought began to grow inside her, she looking down at Babs, then to the floor, then to her sandwich.

"Moi has an idea!" Fifi declared as a cupcake with a candle appeared above her head. Fifi took her sandwich and threw it above her head, opened her mouth wide letting the sandwich fall into her mouth straight to her stomach with a loud thump, her belly shaking like jello when the sandwich hit. With the meal in her the floor beneath her feet cracked with all that newly added weight causing Babs to jump back surprised. Fifi, with a mighty jump, push herself off the ground by just a couple of inches before landing back down with such force that it caused her and everything around her to quake violently. The cracked floor beneath her exploded from the impact resulting Fifi to fall through the floor, and keep falling to the next floor, then to the next one, and to the next one. Babs looked on as Fifi fell several floors down before she reach the last floor with a final loud thud.

"Are you alright Fifi!" Babs rushing to the edge of the hole yelling down to Fifi.

"Oui, and moi found the place," Fifi called back up with joy.

Babs carefully climb down the multiple holes eventually standing next to Fifi. In front of them they both could see a racing ring surrounded by stands with a couple of overhanging lights illuminating the ring below. On one end of the ring was a large fancy seating arrangement for one, they both immediately figured it was for Montana Max. Then from behind them down a large hallway they heard a harmonica echoing off the walls only lit by the occasional overhead lights.

They both moved down the hallway toward the music as quietly as possible, impressive when you consider the size of Fifi's quivering mass as she tiptoe down the hallway following Babs. Eventually they found a door with a sign that said "Private, Keep Out" where the music was originated from.

"Shh, I'll go in and take a look," said Babs, Fifi nodding in agreement.

Opening the door slowly it creaked on it's hinges, Babs could see one big cage in the center being lit by a dim light. Inside the cage was several large, tough looking pigs who was doing different activities to keep themselves busy. One pig leaning at the corner of the cage closet to her with many scars was playing the harmonica, on the other side, one with a eye-patch was balancing a knife on his finger, and four pigs was playing cards on a cardboard table near the center of the cage. Babs stood in the doorway when the music stopped, the pig playing it noticing her with all the pigs soon following suit turn to Babs with a scowl on their faces.

"*Gulp*, is there so happens to be a Hamton Pig here?" Babs asked nervously.

All the pigs look at each other without changing their expressions then back to Babs not saying a word. She stood there nervously didn't know what to do until a familiar voice came from behind the pigs.

"Babs? Is that you?" Walking around from behind the card table Hamton step forward. One of the pigs from the table then looking at Hamton, "you know this rabbit?"

"Yes, she's cool, she's one of my friends!"

"Oh thank the makers, are you a alright," Babs said as she walked to the cage.

"Yea, after Max put me in here I was so afraid but then I became friends with the other pigs and helped me out. And don't worry about them, there really nice."

"He listened to my feelings and made me feel better," said one of the more muscular pigs from the table. Hamton went to the side of that pig, only standing half of the pig's height, and patted his arm comforting him.

"Well don't you all worry we are here to rescue you," Babs said triumphantly as she looked for the keys to the cage. Founding it next to the door, she nabbing it quickly and unlock the cage releasing everyone.

Everyone was shaking Babs hands when Hamton spoke up," Hey, where is Fifi? I hope she's alright!"

Just then there was a rumble coming from outside the door, "I'm here moi amour!" then a large fat purple arm came through the doorway destroying the door and the wall around it and grabbed Hamton. With a squeak Hampton was pulled back through what was left of the doorway and right into the face of Fifi, she rapid fire kisses on his whole body.

"Fifi! What a surprise, and I see you have some changes done to yourself." Hamton speaking through Fifi's kissing.

"Oh, you noticed? Moi put on a couple of pounds just to save you," she replied still kissing him.

"Well I'm just happy that you're alright," he said, Fifi now nuzzling him on her fat cheeks.

"And so moi! Now let's us get out of here horrible place and moi will treat you to a victory meal, non."

"Hold on a moment. Hey guys, will you be alright on your own," Hamton called to the other pigs.

"Yea, we'll be fine, go have your date. Beside we have some unfinished business with our take carer," said the pig with the eye-patch punching his fist into his palm.

The three soon exited the mansion triumphantly finally succeeding there goal. Hampton was rescued from the grasp of Montana Max's scheme and Fifi feeling that she could do anything as they all walked back to their homes, Babs to her hole while Fifi and Hamton, who was tucked safely in between her soft breast giggling with every step she took, to Fifi's home for a little catching up between the two.

"Come on, Sport." Wanda said in an even more hushed tone than Cosmo's, "There's no point in-" She tried to continue, but Timmy cut her off, whispering, "I wish that both of you would stop talking." And as a result, both Cosmo and Wanda stopped talking, leaving him to think about what to do.

He knew he wanted to do something to Vicky, something that would get her irritated to the point of absolute rage, but he also didn't want that rage to be turned on him as a result. And then it hit him, he said, "I wish for a device that will respond only to the first person who tells it their name, and I wish that it would give control over every aspect of Vicky!"

Then with quick wave of Cosmo and Wanda's wands, a device that resembled a game controller with a touch screen of sorts, a small mike sticking out below the screen, and a single antenna poking out of the top appeared in Timmy's hands as it said in a male voice, "Please, state your name."

Then...

"Yeah." Said his green pocket watch. "It's not like if you mess this up you'll have blown your one chance with your dream girl and be forced to marry Tootie and get Vicky as an in-law right?"

The nervous twtching in the boy's eye was his response. Along with the angry look from his wife.

"...Cosmo you idiot."

The door opened and Trixie's father stood at the door.

"You her date for the day."

"Uh yes sir." Timmy said as politly as possible as he calmed himself down.

Her father looked at him for two seconds before reaching behind the door and pushing an even larger version of the girl he had seen at school at the door.

"Just remember to get her home on time and for the love of all things good and sweet make sure you feed her. You'd think she never get's full the way she's been stuffing herself today."

"Hee hee yeah. Never get's full." He said glancing from side to side.

He shut the door and let Timmy let out the breath he never knew he was holding. He turned to see his date and was quite pleased with her progress.

She was wearing a long pink sparkling dress that reached down to her ankles. Her belly stuck out another several inches than before which streched her dress quite a bit. She was getting quite a decent second chin which framed her face nicley in his opinion.

She held out her hand to have him walk her over to the limo which she looked over with a critical eye.

"Mmm not bad. If it were a common black one the dog's would have been chasing you off the estate by now." She said as she pointed over at a row of kennels each containing a dog with foam flying out their mouth's and big enough to use him like a chew toy.

"Well that's good." He say's.

"Though for future possible dating knowledge I prefer a solid platnium limo with diamond studded golden wheel thingies from now on."

"O...kay." He said with a strained look.

She steps into the car as the driver opens the door followed by her date.

"Next stop Che' pauvre faiseur." Said the driver as he closed the door behind the boy.

A loud squeal comes from his date as he see's his date all but dive into the large chocolate cake on the low table on the other end of the limosine which was loaded with more sweet's than than an ordinary kid see's in a month.

Timmy smiled as he see's his ever hungry date dig into the exspensive and highly fattening cake. Eagerly awaiting to see how big she get's between here and the resterant.
14522222121122111.title: Fast forward too the date

choices: "That I was the richest kid in the world."
145222221211221111.content:
They stood in front of the seaters podium in Che' pauvre faiseur the classiest resterant in town. It was so expensive in their that his parents had used his entire college fund to buy an appitiser between them just so they could say they've eaten here.

Of course dad was non to pleased that the Dinkleburg's ate a full meal here the night before .

By non too pleased I he meant they had to hire roofers again.

He looked at hius date who he must have gotten big points with the cake and candy buffet in the limo cause she was letting him hold her hand without pulling it away like she did to start with on the ride over. Of course that was probably because she was busy politly cramming her face with decatuple chocolate fudge cake.

The waiter came over. The thin man with a thinner mustache looked at him in distain before turning to Trixie with a beaming smile.

"Ah miss Tang." He said in a fake french accent. "Love;y to see you. Welcome back to Che' pauvre faiseur were the cost of your appitiser pays our staff for a year"

Timmy gulped a little.

"Might I say you are looking quite lovely. Is it not true that you are responsible for this trend of fat?"

"Why yes Pierre it is."

"Then Pierre must thank you. We have never made so much and that is sayig something is it not."

"Oh Pierre you always know just what to say. Now I'd like the usual table please.

"Of course right this way. Would your beaver faced date also like the hair net and marigold gloves now or later when he can't py the bill."

"Mmm mabye later Pierre."

Now Timmy was really starting to sweat.

They were lead through and extravagent room filled with tables drapped with gold laced silk tablecloths. The dinners he recognised as the upper crust of dimedale society. The millionaires sitting at tiny tables while picking at kiddy size meals sparingly like they didn't have a lot to spend. The mayor, leader of the town was of in a sectioned off corner in the room scrubbing the marble floor and even chip skylarke was up on stage at the other end of the room singing and looking over his shoulder as an angry waiter was waving a tiny piece of paper at him.

"I'm gonna have to make another wish." Said the boy nervously.

"What was that toby?" Said the girl as she was looking at all the differant things everyone around her was eating as the waiter lead them into a private booth reserved for the really big spenders.

They were seated at a decent sized table opposite each other. The table had a beautiful flower display that upon inspection was actually made of thousand dollar bills. Pierre whipped out two menu's and handed each child one. He then pulled out a pad and pencil and awaited their order.

"Now what can Pierre get for you?"

Trixie opened the menu. Looked at it briefly before snapping it shut and handing it back to him.

"Yes."

"Yes what miss Tang?"

"What's that I just gave you."

"The manu?"

"That's right. I'll have everything. Twice in fact."

The fake french waiter's moustache fell to the floor at that statement and didn't bother to pick it up. He turned to Timmy and this time spoke with a southern californian accent.

"And what do you want?"

He also looked briefly.

"Uh I'll have the fi-lle mi-ni-on for dinner and the chocolate pie for dessert. No appitisser thank you."

"Yeah like you could afford it." Said the waiter in the same voice as he took back the menu and walked graceiously out the small room.

"Pierre will be back momentarilly with your food. Is their anything else you need before I leave?"

"Uh yeah where's the bathroom."

"Down the hall and to the left." He said in french before zooming in on the boy and ditching the accent. "Don't even think about running the windows are barred and the attendant has brass knuckles.

"Noted" he said quickly. He turned to his date who was busy devouring the bread basket and buttter. "I'll be right back Trixie." He said

"Hurry back. You need to be here to pick up the check after all." Said the girl as she polished off the bread nd instructed the waiter who was still in the room to bring more bread in.

"He shot down the hall and reached the bathroom. It was all various colours of marble. The stalls where sparking gold and even the water from the pipe' was imported mineral water. The attendant staring down on him was almost an exaact replica of Jorgen von Strangle except deced out like a busboy. Timmy gave a big smile as he walked backwards into the stall an locked it.

"Timmy what are you going to do." Whispered his rose. "Even a glass of water in here cost's as much as your bike. I haven't seen so many zero's since we gave Cosmo an I.Q test."

"Yeah" said the watch who would never get that he was insulted.

"Don't worry guy's I have a plan. I just needed some alone time so I could talk to you to make a wish."

"Ready when you are sport."Said the Rose.

"One wish coming up." Said the watch.

"Cosmo, Wanda, I wish....."
145222221211221111.title: At the resterant

1452222212112211111.content:
"That I was the richest person in the world ever." He said a little louder than needed.

With a grin and a poof with the words's 'filthy rich' spelled out in mud the fairy god parents granted the wish.

Reality around the world began to shift as a new financial juggernaut began to exist on it.

Everywhere in big buisness boardroom's Ceo's were moving to a differant seat at the table to make room for the company's new CEO. A familiar set of buck teeth stylised into a catchy logo were working there way into thousands of product's that were appearing all across the globe.

On a smaller scale Timmy's house exploded outward's as it was replaced with the biggest most extravagent mansion you could ever hope to see. From space that is.

The surrounding neighbourhood went flying away as the expanding estate grew to emcompass a half mile of the surrounding space changing it as it grew. a wall then circled it and was finished of by a titanium gold alloy gate in the shape of two big front teeth.

Various other changes happened around the world but for Timmy Turner the only indication that the wish had worked was when he fell backward's to the floor. He pulled his wallet out with great difficulty and opened it to find it was full to bursting with thousand dollar notes and a more card's than a poker deck.

He smiled as he left the stall and the attendant was waving back at him in a friendly and familiar manner even before he pressed a bill into his oversized hand.

He should have no problem with feeding the girl of his dreams now.

He walked back into the booth and saw with a pleased expression that Trixie was already surrounded by food. The table filled and several waiters standing around the table with carts filled to the brim with food.

Pierre was of course standing to the side of the table having someone else cover for him. He spotted Timmy taking her seat again and this time positivly beamed at him. Sppeaking in the fake accent with true sincerity.

"Ah monsieur so glad you could re join us. Would you like your meal now?"

The boy nodded and the french delicasy was thrust under his nose.

"Thanks. Now do you mind. I want some quiet time with Trixie." He said in a superior tone.

"I'll return later sir about the trivial manner of the bill sir." The head waiter bowed deeply mimiced by the other as they cleared out of the room.

He watched the ever increasing girl slowly but constantly shovel the food down her throat with awe. She was already through ten plates of the 90 they had brought in not including his and it was starting to show. Her belly haad dhot foward anither two inches. Her double chin was obvious now and would soon be too big for her to ignore. The fat on her arms had thickened and had become as big with fat as Francis the bully's were with muscle. Her magical hunger showing no signs of stopping not that it would until he wished for it.

It wasn't til she had dropped her fork for a minute to talk tohim that he found out
1452222212112211111.title: the richest kid in the world

14522222121122111111.content:
"This is the best date weve had yet Timmy. I can't believe you bought the whole resterant tonight just so I could have more food to myself." Trixie said contently as she chewed on a drumstick.

"Well thank you my dear I...." His voice lost the tone of superiority as he realised what she just said. Something about dating before and buying the place. He had to be clever about the questions he asked so not to raise suspicion.

"So, um, I forget. How many date's have we went out on again." He asked her as he watched her shovel he rest of he duck down her throat.

"''munch', silly boy 'chew, chew' weve only been out 3 times. 'chew swallow' It would have been more but you were too busy with all of your buisness work to do so. Not that I haven't minded waiting Timmy." She say's as she reach's for more. "You alway's know just were to take me and have the money to do it no problem,"

"What was that about buisness?"

"You are forgetful tonight aren't you?" She giggled.

"Uh it's because...I'm....blown away by your beauty?!" He said desperatly.

"'giggle' well when you put it that way. Remember that your the head of Turnertech'. The most powerful company in the world which makes everything from car's to candy to all that stuff they make space ships with."

Timmy paled. "I'm in charge of all that?"

"Of course. It's only been a year since you created it remember."

"Oh yeah. heh heh heh." He said nervously as he looked at his rose and watch who both looked back at him with the same worried expression. A multi trillion dollar company when he was 9 years old? Those two were so gonna get it later.

"You going to eat that." Asked the fattening girl. Timmy looked and saw that his date had finished all 90 plates off food and was eyeing his untouched meal.

"Sure if you want....." He was cut of as she reached over the table. Making her latge belly press down and out to the sides of her a foot and a half in each direction much to Timmy's delight.

She grabbed the plate back and quickly consumed it before leaning back in her chair happily.

"I don't know what's wrong with me. I know the fatter you get the more you can eat but I've been eating non stop all day and I've not felt even a little full yet."

"Don't ask me. Hey look at the time weve got a movie to catch." He said trying to get her to think about something else.

"I guess your right." Said Trixie with a small tone of disipointment. "Pierre." She called out.

"Yes Miss Tang." Said the man who appeared in a flash. "Would you care for the bill?" He said even though he was already writing it.

A curt nod and the paper was put under Timmy's nose. It read that the total sum for ordering that much came to £1,500,000.72

'Wow when they said expensive they weren't kidding.' He wondered how he was going to pay when he saw pierre whip out a card reader.

"Which card will you be using toaday mister Turner."

'That's right' he thought as he reached into his wallt and pulled out a double platnium card.

He was a little surprised when the machine accepted it and it was given back to him.

"Thank you Sir. Now let Pierre help you and Miss Tang to the door. If I rememeber you told me to have you out so you could see the romanic movie. Ha ha 'wink'."

As he and Trixie were lead back to the doorhe noted that there were indeed no other guests here tonight just like Trixie said.

Trixie by the way was even bigger than when they came in. Her double chin was now fully formed and then some. Her arms now had a little overhang over her forarms. Her belly was another 5 inches bigger than last and she was starting to mix between walking and a light waddle. Her dress was definetly starting to show signs of stress and strain. He'd have to do something soon or she'd be to embarresed from her cloths ripping to be seen with him again.

They stepped outside and Pierre helped Trixie down the stairs before going back into the resterant which he noticed had a long line of elitists outside of it.

His limo pulled up and he noted that it was now the kind of Limo that Trixie wanted. The platnium plating blinding everyone looking at it.

The driver still dressed as he was opened he door to let the two enter again.

"Next stop the Timmyplex." He said.

"Let me guess. I own the place?" He said dryly.

"Of course sir. You bought it along with everything else in Dimmsdale owned by Dud Dimmidome."

"Dud Dimmidome?"

"That's right Dud Dimmidome. Former owner of the Dimmsdale Dimmidome."

A familiar squel echoed in the car as he saw Trixie once again all but dive for the sweets at the other end of the car.

"I hope you don't mind master Turner but I toook the liberty of getting everything restocked for your ever hungry date." He said as he closed the door.

He looked back back at his date and relaxed as he watched her eat and get bigger. His worry's about this wish backfiring washing away in a wave of sparkling pink fat.
14522222121122111111.title: They'd been dating for awhile

145222221211221111112.content:
With his date suitably distracted at the other end of the car Timmy took this time to talk to his Godparent's.

"Okay guy's what gives. I wished for money not to be a big time tycoon." Said the boy in an annoyed tone.

"Uhh." Said the objects in perfect sync before the rose picked up here the watch couldn't continue. "Actually Timmy you wished to 'be the richest person in the world ever.' Right?"

"Yeah." answered the buck toothed boy.

"Well wishing you were rich and wishing for money are to differant things. Wishing for money would have given you just that, no changes to reality since all we would do is make the money appear. Wishing you were rich however meant you had to have money in the first place. Something we could only do by changing the world."

"So why couldn't you have made mom or dad the buisness big wig instead of the ten year old kid."

"Who has the world record for most F's and is the worst possible choice to give any sort of power whatsoever." Cosmo chimed in causing his wife and godson to give him a withering glare.

"Well sport like I said you wished that you were the richest 'Person' in the world. If you had said 'kid' then we could have made your parents the one's with the company but you said 'person' implying that 'you' wanted to be the one in charge."

"But I'm only 10 I can't deal with being in charge of a major corporation." Said the distressed boy.

"Well you can always unwish the wish Timmy." Said the rose in a happy voice as she prepared to do so.

" Good idea. I wish..."

Cosmo butted in. "Of course if you do that then theyre's a very big chance that Trixe will dump you at the end of the date crushing your one chance at true love and forcing you to settle for Tootie which would when relate you to Vicky."

The rest of the word's died on Timmy's lips as he sucked them back in. He now realised how close he had been to blowing a sure thing with his perfect girl. Sure he could have just wished the rest of the night for whatever he needed but past experience showed that never worked out the way he wanted. As the richest person to ever live however he could accomodate the corpulent beauty with no worry that this would be the only chance he has at her.

He could have wished that it was his parent's in charge of TurnerTech but he remembered that neither could be considered any more intellligent than he and even less responsible considering the circumstances he got Cosmo and Wanda.

Their was also the fact that if he didn't need them like a person in his position shouldn't then he might lose his fairy God parents. Something he could'nt bear.

Although that does get him wondering why they hadn't vanished already.

He was so lost in his thought's that he almost didn't feel Trixie take his hand as she stepped out of the car in front of the movie theater he owned and too his surprise his vision was filled with bright flash's and questions concerning him filled the air
145222221211221111112.title: An explanation

1452222212112211111121.content:
The two walked down the red carpet hand in hand as reporters flashed their camera's and shouted out questions.

"Mr Turner. Mr Turner over here. Is it true that your planning to have the town renamed Turnersdale."

"How do you feel about being named the worlds most powerful man at only ten."

"Are you and Miss Tang planning to tie the knot when your old enough."

The last question made Timmy a little more than nervous as they hurried down th carpet as fast as they could and through the doors.

He sighed in relief as he wiped away imaginary sweat. He looked around the Timmyplex lobby and noted that he and Trixie were apparently the only one's here besides the staff. The place itself had underwent huge changes. Before when it was run by that movie buff who cared less about his customers than his own personnel hygiene it was a dump. The floor was literally made of chewing gum and the lights were flickering on and off. Now it was spotless. The floors were covered in beautiful rich red carpet. The walls covered in blue tiling and the lighting now consisted of chandeliers. The dorky looking, lazy, pizza faced and rude teenage boy's dressed in sweat stained shirts were all gone and replaced with what appeared to be supermodels of both genders all working diligently.

A hard pull from Trixie had him walking in the direction of what has to be the cinema candy shop he had ever seen. Behind the counter was a trio of women who looked like they should be on fashion magazines. The one closest to him gave him a big smile.

"Mr Turner so nice to see you. You and miss Tang ready to see the movie?"

Trixie answered.

"Yes just as soon as we get the snacks Amanda." She said in a voice like she was talking to an old friend.

"Oh the usual then?"

His corpulant date nodded. The older women smiled as she looked over at the other two how were standing behind her ready to burst into action.

"You heard her girls. Everything we have and smothered in butter."

The two women burst into action like I said. One bringing out a giant bag of popcorn kernals and pouring every last one into a hatch at the back of the stall. Above the hatch was a label that said 'popcorn machine'. The other one was busy ripping open every bag of candy she could find at pouring them down a large pipe which made a nose like a vacuum. Amanda moved to put on everything else. 10 hotdogs rotated in the machine as the smell of salsa and sour cream being heated filled the air. She walked back over to the two. One of which was gazing at the food it longing.

"Okay your food will all be ready by the time you get up to your private screen sir.

"Shouldn't we carry some of it?" Questioned the wealthy boy. Getting a laugh from the model like woman.

"Oh no way sir. After last time you brought your sweety here we installed the chutes to get most of the foo items from here to the screen so we don't throw our backs out trying to carry everything. Everything but the hot dogs, cotton candy and nachos will already be their by the time you reach the screen."

"Oh....okay then." He said simply as Amanda punched the numbers into the till. The total came to $400 dollars. A pitiful sum to the new him as he pulled out the smallest denomination he had in his wallet. $1000 dollars and told her to split the change among themselves.

He felt another pull as Trixie began to drag him over to an escalator to the upper level of the cinema.

"Come on I want to get their before the popcorn get's cold."

As he was being dragged away Amanda and the two other top model class women giggled amongst themselves and waved after him.

"Good luck mister Turner. Don't get too bored during the movie."

That didn't make him feel any better as the escalator took him upstairs and placed he and his dream girl in front of a huge pair of double doors with the word's 'Turner private screening room'
1452222212112211111121.title: Enter the theater

14522222121122111111211.content:
Timmy and Trixie walked inside. The were at some balcony. From here you had the best view at the movie and there was already a huge chair for Trixie.
Timmie suddenly saw something moving near the scream. Was it someone from the staff? But why would they be there? Besides it did't looked like the staff. much too small and no super model body. The figure turned it's head and Timmy saw three times spots of reflected light. So the person who was down there must wear glasses and braces (or metal teeth). The person ran away and he saw two tails.

"Tootie! What is she doing here?"

"Well she loves you." Wanda started.

"And she seemed pretty upset that you went on just one date with Trixie." Cosmo continued.

"So i guess you three times going on a date with Trixie must be really terrible for her."

"So the whole world changed but she still loves me!" Timmy said kind of angry.

"Well she loved you when you were a normal kid so why not when you rich? That's only better." Cosmo said happy.

"Besides honey, Tootie's love for you is real and you know our powers can't make or destroy real love so when we changed everything her love was immune for our magic. So it staid just the way it is." Wanda said.

"Too bad for her but i love Trixie."

Trixie was so busy eating that she did't even realized Timmie was talking with his watch and rose.
The movie started but Timmie did't paid much attention too it. He was thinking about what too do now. Finally he had a date with Trixie and she was fat. So his dream came true, but now he was the richest person in the world and he had so much power that could be very dangerous in his hands. He had lot of experience in that. His mind also was wondering what was Tootie doing here? Spying at him? Hoping he and Trixie would break up. He was wondering or Tootie already followed him on the date before he was the richest in the world.
In the meantime Trixie ate like there was no tomorrow. She was making a real pig of herself. Finally her dress could't take it anymore and tore apart in shreds and Trixie was still eating in her underwear. Timmie closed his eyes and clapped in his hands. Two girls came in with a much bigger dress and helped Trixie in it and after that Trixie went on like nothing happened.
Suddenly he got a funny idea and walked to the food and start feeding it too her. A huge smile appeared on her face while Timmy feed her every piece of food.

"This is great Timmy. You feeding me. Then i don't even have too use my arms."

Timmie knew there could be trouble with him being the richest person in the world but now he wanted too just enjoy his date with Trixie.
14522222121122111111211.title: Real love is immune for magic

145222221211221111112111.content:
While Timmy was busy feeding his dream girl a certain plump sister of the devil was trying not to grind her teeth in rage.

It was really quite clever. She'd removed her braces for the night and put on special non reflective glass's. Then she'd simply taken her normal glass's and put them on the back of her head while using a cecklace to simulate the shine of her brace's. This way she could watch Timmy and that witch he was with all night.

''How the heck did she get that big?' She thought. No wonder Timmy was fauning over Trixie and not her. Trixe had practically doubled in weight in a few measly hours while she had barly put on anything. How was it possible to get that fat that quickly.

It wasn't fair. She'd loved Timmy Turner since even before he was rich. He see's this witch on the first day of fourth grade and he's gaa gaa over her just like every other boy in class. I mean it was obvious shew only liked him because he was the richest person in the world. She'd loved him since the moment she saw the amazing buck toothed boy.

She slinked out of her seat as she saw the two of them leave the Turner private balcony. She poked her head out of the doors and watched them leave.

Toottie couldn't believe it. Somehow that airhead had gotten even fatter since they'd all arrived here.

The fatter you were the prettier you were. That's how it worked now even though non of the other boy's in the school seemed to think for some reason. It was Timmy and only Timmy how thought fat was good and right now he had the fattest young girl in Dimmsdale on his arm.

Something deep inside Tootie snapped. Fire of determination burning in her eye's.

'One way or another Tang. No matter what the cost. No matter what I have to do. I promise that I will get fatter than you'll ever be. Timmy Turner will be MINE!!!' She screamed in her head so she wouldn't freak out the supermodel bodied staff.

With her mind made up she followed after her dream boy and his date as they headed back to Tang manor.
145222221211221111112111.title: See what Tootie is doing

1452222212112211111121111.content:
She jumped on her bike and followed the limo. It was't hard to follow such a car since everyone who saw it was talking about it for the first two minutes and such a big car could't move that fast in small streets and Tootie knew were they were going and she knew a shortcut too Tang manor.
Timmie and Trixie arrived two minutes later then Tootie. She hide in the bushes and almost choke in anger when she saw Trixie kissing Timmie.

"Oh no! Don't you dare to kiss my boyfriend!" She whispered.

Timmie blushed when Trixie kissed him and walked back to his car with a silly smile.
Tootie was thinking what too do. She could follow Timmy, but his house was so well protected with alarms there already would sound a bell thinking about it. The she wondered again how it was possible that Trixie did gain so much.

"Let's see how miss i'm-so-much-better-then-you can gain so much."

She took some chewing gum out of her bag and chewed on it and when it was soft she put it on her hands and shoes and slowly started to climb up the wall and looked through Trixie's window.
Trixie was standing in front of her mirror admiring her new love handles.

"Mirror mirror on the wall who's the fattest girl of all? That's me. Oh yeah!"

"You would almost throw up." Tootie said.

"That date was really great and i'm so much fatter. Hmm i need to ask dad to make the doors wider or i won't fit through after a few days. And the bath tub, and the shower, and my bed, and of course my whole wardrobe. I'm gaining so fast i'm outgrowing anything. I don't know how. I' know i'm eating a lot but for some reason i can't get full. I feel like i could eat a entire zoo and still don't feel full. Why do i stay hungry?"

"Strange. Doesn't like like she knows why she is gaining. But she is and very fast. But i will even eat myself to the point of throwing up if i could get Timmie Turner to be my boyfriend." Tootie said.

She took one last look at the obese girl and walked the wall off like if it was normal. When she reached the ground she stopped one moment to get the chewing gum off her shoes and feet ad threw the chewing gum in a garbage bin. She sadly walked towards her bike and slowly ride home. She thought being by how she could become fatter then Trixie and all the others. Kind of hard if you're one of the nerds girls in school and the guy is the most popular and richest boy and his girlfriend is the most popular and richest girl.
Finally home she walked up to her room and saw Vicky.

"Guess what little sister. I..."

"I don't care! I'm in a bad mood! Beat it big sis!"

Tootie would normally never say something like this too Vicky but tonight she was in such a bad mood that she did't mind and Vicky was surprised she did't even think about beating up her little sister
Tootie went straight to her room jumped on her bed and started too cry.
1452222212112211111121111.title: Tootie is in a bad mood

145222221211221111112112.content:
The closing credits began to move up the screen as the movie finished.

'Finally! I thought that piece of crud would never end.' Timmy thought. He had been forced to watch a w and a half hour movie that was nothing short of 'gag me' on the romance scale. No boy in their right mind would even last 5 minutes into it.

Of course he wasn't currently in his right mind. Trixie had started to feel lethargic and sleepy during the movie. Mostly due to her new poundage so she had taken to leaning against his shoulder. She was kinda heavy and his shoulder was a little numb for having her lean on it for an hour and fifteen minutes but he felt it was totally worth it. He would 'NOT' have had this chance if he had not made that wish earlier tonight. Aside from the enormous responsibility he had bestowed upon himself as most powerful being alive. Having the girl of your dreams like you back made it all worth it.

He shook her head lightly causing the plump girl to stir. She rubbed her eye with a meaty fist before looking at the screen in mild dissipointment.

"The movie's over. I didn't even get to see the ending.'

"Don't worry Trixie. We can just see it again tomorrow."

"What about tonight." She said as she looked at him while fluttering her eyelash's. It would have worked had he not went pale at the word 'tonight'.

'Once was enough. Twice in a row will kill me. Think fast Turner.' He thought desperately. "Uh sorry Trixie but I did promise your dad I would get you home on time. You know what parents are like."

"Sigh. I know. And the only thing that saves you from the dogs is that he works for you." She said as she rose out of her seat slower than usual.

'Not surprising.' Timmy thought dryly. If he was as powerful as he had been hearing then it would not surprise him in the least if he could walk into the white house tomorrow and say he was in charge without anyone disagreeing.

He and his Trixie grasped hands as they made to exit the balcony. He glanced down to the floor below and saw that the reflections of light had dissipeared. Tootie was on the move again no doubt to try and follow him.

A small part of him felt sorry for her. He too knew what it was like to love someone who would never love you back. It wasn't that he didn't like Tootie. He did but definitely not in the way she wanted. He liked her as a friend and nothing more.

Meanwhile he had loved Trixie since the first moment he saw her, on the day he started fourth grade and now she actually liked him back and this was not something any amount of pity would get him to unwish.

Besides being Tooties boyfriend would have the unpleasant side effect of more time around Vickie. Something that would rather sadly ensure that Tootie would have boy trouble until she or her sister moved out of their parent's house.

They both stepped back into the ridiculously shiny Limo and his date once again dove at the refreshed pile of confectionary's. This time of course she had let him feed her several pieces of cake. They even made a few games out of eating the smaller candies were they would take turns trying to catch them in their mouth's. He was a little relieved to see that she was not upset about him helping himself to the food as well.

He was originally a little worried she'd turn into a greedy hog but the way she was slowly and politely stuffing herself all night and not grabbing away any of his food without asking had crushed those worry's.

She pulled up in front of Tang manor. Noticably larger than last he saw by about double the size.

'Wow I must pay Mr Tang really well' Thought the buck tooth Trillionaire as he led his ever hungry girlfriend up to her door. Even the guard dogs which before had been pulling at their chains to attack him began to wag their tails excitedly when they saw him

"Thank you for a wonderful night Timmy. Everything was exactly as I expected."

Timmy blushed a little as for the first time of the night his date's 'entire' attention was on him. Her warm smile making him sweat a little and his cheeks tinge pink.

He was saved as the door opened and Trixie's father popped his head outside. Instead of the slightly condescending look he had received earlier he was now looking at him like he was his hero.

"Mr Turner. I hope you and my daughter enjoyed your date."

"Oh we did daddy. He bought the whole restaurant just for me."

"The restaurant you say. Well just another two percent and you'll officially own the whole town." He said in a happy yet patronizing voice.

"Uh huh." Was all the boy could say. He'd sort everything out when he gets home.

"Now uh sir. I'm sorry if it angers you but it is a school night and you do both have school tomorrow. That it of course if you want to go I what reason do you have to go to school for? hee hee" He said the second sentence in a hurried voice when he noticed Timmy's slight frown when he mentioned school.

The boy sighed but nodded. He turned to head back to the car but his girlfriend called out.

"Wait Timmy." He turned slightly to face her and went completely numb as he felt the girl kiss him on the cheek. He stood their frozen like a statue even after the girl had went back inside the house. Eventually the driver came out, picked him up and put him in the back of the limo before driving of to Turner mansion.
145222221211221111112112.title: After the movie is over...

1452222212112211111121121.content:
"Well that went pretty well." Said Wanda still in rose form.

"Yeah. You got the girl of your dream's 'and' became obscenly wealthy all in one night. Life is great." Said Cosmo.

Timmy didn't respond and kept staring out the window as the city moved past the window.

"Whats the matter sport?" Asked Wanda.

He was silent for a moment before responding "Why are you guys still here?"

"Huh?" Said the diguised fairy couple in perfect sync.

"I'm the richest person in the world. I've got the girl of my dreams. But for some reason I still have fairy godparents that are only supposed to be here when I'm miserable. So why are you still here."

"Well....." Wanda started to explain only to pause "....ya know thats a really good question."

"Oh oh I know." Said Cosmo. "Mabye Vicky's still your baby sitter."

Timmy shuddered. "I hope not."

"Well no point worrying now. Lets just wait to get home." Said Wanda

Timmy nodded before pressing the intercom button on the arm rest. "Hey drive. How much longer till we get home?"

The driver responded. "Around five minutes ago sir."

"What!" He said surprised. He looked out the window and saw a huge open field. Looking closer he saw that it was far to well kept to be a field and realised it was a garden. His surprise grew when he past things like a skate park, basketball court and this huge building with 'game room' in hug letters over the doors.

"Okay sir were at the main house." Said the driver just as the door opened by a buttler standing outside.

The boy and his fairys eyes would have popped out their sockets if they could.

It was without a doubt the biggest house he had ever seen. Easily bigger than even the white house in length, breadth and height by more than double. It even resembled the presidential home somewhat except where there was only white this was more like cream coloured brick with gold lined window frames. Even the doorway in front of him looked to be made of very expensive wood with a diamond as big as a potatoe for a doorhandle. On either side of you was a number of butlers and maids who were of the same appearance as the theater employees.

He slowly made his way to the door looking from side to side as these people bowed respectivly to him. He jumped a bit as his jacket was pulled from him as were his other fancy cloth's and they were replaced by what appeared to be his old cloth's. Except he was pretty sure they wern't made of silk before.

One young woman dressed in a buisness suit and glass's stepped foward holding a pda.

"Good evening mister Turner. I trust the date went well with Ms Tang?" She said smiling.

"Uh Yeah I guess" He said to the strange woman.

"Good. Now please follow me to your office. You have only a few things to do before you can relax." She said as she walked into the house.

"Really? Like what." He said as he followed her. This place made Remy Buckaplety's house look like chester's trailer. It was also quite sterotypically rich. Valuable art hung from every wall, large winding stairways and even a marble statue of himself in the middle of the room thrice his size.

"Well you have a board member meeting via satilitte in ten minutes. Then you have to go over the 30 or so project proposels by our reasearch deparment, then you have a satilitte meeting with your parent's.

"They arn't here?" He asked confused.

The woman turned to face him. Giving him a starnge look.

"Sir you haven't had actual contact with them for over a year." She saw the boy's eye's grow shocked then a touch sad. "How about we get you in touch with them first okay." She said to comfort him.

He nodded and followed her to a room with a large screen on the wall. He sat down just as the screen lit up. There were his parent's against some sort of tropical backdrop.

At least they looked 'sorta' like his parent's. Between the botox, implant's, coligen, dyed hair and a host of other age defying surgical options they looked more like barbie and ken to mom and dad. They were both lying on sun lounger's being pampered by either ripped he-men in speedo's or bikini clad women.

"Hi Money." Said dad as he took a sip of a drink one of the girl's were holding.

"That's Timmy." The boy said to the guy he assumed was his father.

"Yeahsurewhatever." He said in an all too familiar way. The 'shut up I don't care' way.

"We need you to wire over some more money." Said the barbie doll he recognised as his mom.

Timmy was about to answer when the girl cut him off and spook in a cold tone.

"How much as why?"

"Oh hi Vanessa. We just need $20,000,000 so we can build a new villa here in Crete. My bathroom sink faucet is a little leaky." Said his mom like it was nothing.

"Wouldn't it be cheaper to have the plumbing fixed." Vanessa said with anger at the edge of her calm speech.

The two on screen looked at each other before bursting out into hysterics. Like the concept of 'cheaper' was foriegn to them.

"Bye Money." Waved his dad.

"Send us the money soon." Said his mom in a freindly voice before the screen went blank.

Timmy as well as his godparent's stared at the screen/ At least they knew now how he could still be miserable when he was this wealthy.

Vanessa clenched her hand into a fist. "Worthless money wasting leech's." She muttered before seeing Timmy's crestfallen knelt down to his side with a smile.

"Hey know cheer up. It's not your fault theyre like that." She said.

He looked at her. "They wouldn't be this way if I wasn't rich." He said sadly.

"Oh know you don't know that." She said.

'Oh yeah I do.' He thought bitterly.

"Look even if you didn't you couldn't change how they are. You know this house was the first thing they bought when you had ebough money, they only stayed a week then left never to come back. Money may change you but you don't forget your only son's name just cause your rich. That's the way theyve always truely been."

That didn't help much to cheer him up. She wanted to help him more but he dis still have things to do.

"I'm sorry Timmy but weve got to get to patch through the board member's now okay." She said.

Timmy looked at her sadly but nodded. Sitting up in the chair just as the screen lit up again.
1452222212112211111121121.title: At his 'new' home

14522222121122111111211211.content:
The next day around dinner time
===========

While Timmy was continuing to discover the joy's of his new life the Tang's were having dinner

*Chomp* *Munch* *Chew*

"So dear how was work today?" Asked Ms Tang to her husband a little loudly as she picked at her dinner.

*Crunch* *Gulp*

"Oh...ah, pretty good dear. Were three months ahead on the new electric motor designs and..........."

*CHOMP* *CHEW*

"What was that dear?" Said the woman as she strained to hear her husband.

"I said...*GNASH* *CRUNCH*...which will *MUNCH* Grrr TRIXIE WOULD YOU STOP THAT!!!" Shouted mister Tang at his ever expanding daughter.

Sitting opposite her mother and next to her father who was at the table head was Trixie eating like it was going out of style. In opposition to the nuvo cuisine (small portion with an artistic appearance.) And her fathers single plate of steak and mash. Trixie was surrounded by plate upon plate of food fit for a lumberjack. 5 steaks each 5 times thicker than her dad's were piled onto a single plate, next to it was a salad mixing bowl full of potatoes with enough butter in them to dye the mash bright yellow.

"Stop what daddy kins?" Trixie said as she took a fork to her steak and...

*Munch*

with speed they couldn't hope to follow and with a manner far politer than before now people were looking Trixie had polished off the entire plate in a second. Literally one second the plate was stacked with steak and the next it was clean enough to see yourself with only the sounds of her chewing for a second as any indication that she had eaten them.

Mr Tang looked at his corpulent daughter for a moment before trying a different tactic than just yelling at her. He bridged his fingers and went into business mode.

"Trixie. Your mother and I. Well we've noticed you've somehow changed in the last few days." He said calmly.

"Really? I haven't noticed anything." Trixie said before digging into a 5 pound plate of spaghetti that the butler had put down and somehow managed to eat it all in 'slurp' on a single strand.

Her mother butted in. "What your father means dear is that you seem to have put on a little weight."

Trixie polished off the mash and glanced at her mother before moving onto a whole chicken "A lot." She said idly.

"Now now it's nothing to.....wait, you know? Your not denying it?" Mrs Tang said.

"Why would I deny it. I love it!" Said the fattening girl as she cleaned the birds bones.

Her mother had a less than calm reaction. "LOVE IT! Trixie look at you! Your fat and just shy of being morbidly obese."

Trixie regarded that as she devoured a beef casserole in seconds "How much longer do you think it'll be before I 'am' obese?"

That wasn't what her mother wanted to hear. "Tri-TRIXIE!!! This can't be healthy. What will your friend's think?what will mister Turner think? Do you want your fathers good to be in jeopardy because mister Turner dumped you?"

"*Giggle* Timmy wouldn't dump me. He likes it." She said. A statement which her mother and father go wide eyed at.

"He...likes..it?" Her father said slowly to make sure he heard right.

She nodded right before digging into a large fifty scoop sundae complete like an entire bunch of bananas and a whole can of whipped crème.

"And he told you this?" Her mother asked. A little uncomfortable that such a powerful person could have such an odd fetish.

"Well you see the other day I got really hungry all of a sudden and put on a little weight really quickly. Anyway the next day Timmy says I looked nice fatter and asked me out on another date. One way better than any we've had before. The way he made sure I had all I wanted to eat and hand feed me was a good sign that he likes fat girls.” She said proudly before sticking out her bulging stomach for emphasis.

“But I...” Her mother tried to say something but was cut off by her daughter standing up.

“Well if you can excuse me I have to have my beauty sleep right after I eat. I have to look my best for Timmy after all.” She started to leave. Her mother actually shot out of her seat looking distressed.

“Bed?! It's

“Yeah I know. But it's important that I not burn off to many calories to I shouldn't move around to much.”

Her mother sputtered.

“But..Bu..Bu,but what about school? What about your friend's? What about your future? Are you really going to throw it all away to be a fat slob!?” She said angrily

Trixie barely looked phased by the insult. “Lets see. In that order. I'll be marrying rich so no I don't care about school. Veronica and the girls are all in on the fat trend. I'm going to be treated like a queen by the richest guy on the planet so forget modelling, oh and F.Y.I a slob means being messy and gassy which I am so totally not but other then that 'yeah' I think I'll stay fat. Later” She turned back and waddled off.

Ms Tang lowered herself back to the table. Clearly in shock.

Mr Tang coughed nervously. “So.....how was your day dear?”

Drew: I wouldn't worry about it Angelica. Who knows, this might be a welcome change for all of us.

Angelica: If you say so..

A few days later on a saturday morning, Angelica woke to the delicious smell of breakfast being cooked.

Angelica: *sniffs* This can't be dad; he usually works overtime at the office this time of the year. That means its...

Shrugging, the 13 year old threw on her slippers and made her way down to the kitchen. What she saw surprised her. There was her mom, cooking at the stove and what appeared to be an assortment of bacon, sausage, eggs, etc...

Charlotte: Good morning, Angelica..

Angelica: Did you cook all this, mom?

Charlotte: Well, since I have all this free time, I decided to put it to good use. Besides I didn't know how much you wanted. Now grab a plate and start eating!

Angelica looked at all the food her mother had cooked, and decided to..

"Mmm, Kimi, could you pass the nachos?"

"Oh, uh, here, Lil."

Lil grabbed the nachos, then ate them and watched another button pop off her skirt.

"Looks like that makes four this month. How about you, Kimi?"

POP! "I'm up to four, too." Kimi's shirt lost a button. For about a month, the girls had been eating at the mall's entire food court to gain as much as they can. It became necessary not only to buy food, but clothes. Luckily, the girls earned money through extra chores and by buying together, they saved on meals. The food court also allowed them to taste test their food and gave them discounts on it. This allowed their wallets, and their bellies, to grow.

"So," Lil said while trying to move out of her chair, "Do you want to get something else to eat, or are you full?"

Kimi rested her hands on her belly and briefly patted it. "Maybe some ice cream; I've still got room."

"Kimi?" "Lil?"

"Nicole?" "Wally?"

The four girls stood in shock as they saw each other in their new plump bodies. Nicole's N belt had just popped off, letting her belly poke out further than it already had been, while Wally was adjusting her long skirt to make it fit better.

All four were in shock until one pair said something.
1452222221221221222.title: Nicole (Chuckie's one-time crush) and Wally...
