14522222212212212221.content:
Lil spoke first, addressing Wally.

"Wally, uh, so, what's new with you?"

"About fifty pounds, I'd say," was Wally's reply. "Same here," said Nicole. "Have you tried these new ice cream flavors? They're amazing!"

"You guys got big on ice cream?" Kimi was puzzled at first, but then realized how fattening ice cream could be.

Wally responded, "Of course, that's what happens when you get jobs tasting new ice cream flavors. Nicole and I have been doing this for about a month." Nicole added, "And they're so good, we can't get enough. That's what really fattened us up. How about you two?"

"We've been doing some good old-fashioned gorging and testing ourselves," Lil said. "We sample from the whole food court, but it's weird. How are we only as big as you guys?"

"Hmm." Wally thought this through, until Nicole said, "Maybe you two didn't each as much food as we did, or as much fat."

"I'll go with the fat thing," said Kimi. "Even the burgers and fries here don't have that much fat. Besides, we ate a ton of food practically every day."

"Just one thing, Wally," Lil asked. "Why did you even try this job, anyway? Isn't it hard for you to play soccer now?"

"Not really. Watch this." Wally moved to an open area and dribbled a soccer ball all over her fattened body. Even with her new fat, she was still expertly controlling the ball, though it did bounce a little more thanks to Wally's extra weight.

"I just keep bouncing the ball around. Running isn't that hard, either. I just pace myself and kick hard." Lil was impressed. She was having some difficulty practicing her skills ever since she started putting on weight. Nicole then proposed that the fat foursome do something together. "What do you guys want to do now?"
14522222212212212221.title: Kimi and/or Lil spoke first.

choices: Follow them back to Kimi's house.
145222222122122122211.content:
The girls were already at the ice cream shop, so they ordered as much as they could to see who could eat the most. Even though Lil and Kimi had already eaten a big lunch, as it turns out, so did Wally and Nicole.

"Wally, was it only ice cream you and Nicole have been eating?" asked Lil. "You two shouldn't be as big as us if it is, even if it's high in fat." Wally replied, "Whoops, you caught us! We just figured if we're pigging out on ice cream, why not eat everything else, too?" Lil didn't quite get it, but she was about to eat ice cream until she popped, so she was just going to assume that Wally and Nicole wanted to be fat like her and Kimi, too (A correct assumption; Wally and Nicole were also testers for the food court's meals.), grabbed her spoon and dug in.

Since the four girls all had full bellies already, it was an even match. They must have had room somewhere inside, however, because they kept putting entire bowls of ice cream inside themselves. The truly amazing thing, though, was that they didn't get a single brain freeze. As far as cost was concerned, now that all four girls were taste testers (Kimi and Lil signed up when Wally and Nicole told them about their jobs.), they were also tasting new flavors while stuffing themselves, so cost was minimal. There was also no room for conversation; the girls just kept eating and eating.
The only sounds heard from them were the noises they made while they ate, the popping of buttons from their shirts and skirts and in some cases, tearing, as they grew, and the sounds that echoed from the patting of their giant bellies when they finished.

At the end of the contest, all four girls were ready to explode, but looked content as they digested their food. Kimi just barely won, having consumed one more bowl than each of the rest of the girls. She was too stuffed to celebrate, though.

After a couple of minutes' rest and evaluation of the new flavors, they waddled to Kimi's house to rest.
145222222122122122211.title: See who can eat the most ice cream.

1452222221221221222111.content:
The four girls made it to Kimi's room and plopped themselves down where they could. All of them were bursting out of their clothes. Kimi's yellow shirt lost half of its buttons and the other half were starting to strain. Her green skirt had long lost its button, letting her belly flow freely, and though it stretched a bit, it had a hard time covering Kimi's rear, so Kimi sometimes had to pull on it to cover her sky-blue panties. Lil had similar issues with her pink skirt; it had trouble covering her purple panties, which also poked out the front after the buttons popped. Lil adapted to the latter by stuffing her belly into the skirt, which actually worked fairly well. Lil's red shirt, just like the others, was several sizes too small for her.

Wally had a pink tank top on that exposed her belly while she was thin, but now had trouble staying on her fattened body; Wally's fat threatened to tear the straps. Her long, blue skirt still reached to her knees as before, but it split in the back after the contest, showing white panties. Nicole, meanwhile, opted for an orange shirt, but, of course, it ended up exposing her belly, which stretched her white skirt outwards. This skirt was fairly long, reaching just past Nicole's knees, but, like Wally's, it split in the back to show cream-colored panties.

As the four girls laid there asleep, they dreamed of living in a town made of food, where they could be fat and happy all the time. When they woke up, though, they snapped out of their food euphoria and realized that they had damaged clothing.

"Whoa, we really pigged out," Lil said, looking at her friends, then at herself. "Looks like our clothes could use some work, too." Nicole perked up and said, "I've been learning tailoring. I can fix up what we've got until we can get new clothes."

After the girls gave Nicole their outfits, she fixed them so that they fit their bodies, which were at least double the size they were a month ago. While the girls were only clad in underwear, they noticed how much they had changed in that time. They looked at photos of themselves before their gain and were shocked as to how fat they really were, yet at the same time, they were impressed with themselves. They felt proud for fattening up as fast as they did, and sought to fatten up even more, just not so much that it would harm their health. That would be another day, though, because even after the girls' outfits were fixed, it took enough effort to put them back on so that the girls were tired again. They ate very little before going to bed, but were still determined to gain.

14522222221222.title: What if Frankie imagines the cookies?

choices: “Fine. How could I say ‘no’ to you?”

145222222212221.content:
“Get here you little-“ Frankie gasped at the sudden blurred motion of the creature she desperately pursued. Down the hall, it faked Frankie out by turning left then jumping right. No matter since she was far behind enough to make the correct turn in time. The doors and onlooking imaginary friends blurred past while Frankie pumped her legs harder, each stride sending her closer and closer to the running pair of sneakers. Then-

To the left.

To the right.

It ducked away and out of sight.

Out of breath, Frankie fell to her knees, “Just whose stupid idea was it anyone to imagine a pair of sneakers that run fast. I mean-,” She threw her hands up in the air, “Aw, forgot it. I’ll just tell Mr. Herriman that-. The familiar sound of loud thumping approached behind Frankie, “Tell me what?”

“T-tell you that the sneakers got away.”

Mr. Herriman held up the sneakers one hand. The pair didn’t bother putting up a fight. “They like to run around when their laces are loose.” Herriman informed. “Isn’t that right?” The sneakers closed their eyes in admitted defeat.

“B-but how?”

The giant, fancy rabbit cleared his throat, “There are more practical ways to solve a problem rather than physical chasing them.”

“But wasn’t it you who told me to tackle my problems head on?”

“Correct, but that doesn’t mean you can’t use your brain.” He guided in his typical, speaking with both eyes closed manner.

“Now, I will return these sneakers to their proper room and administer the proper punishment. Miss Francis, I want you to think about what I said. Understood?”

Frankie crossed her arms and sighed, “Understood.” Mr. Herriman hopped away with his giant feet and sneakers in hand.

Frankie made the trip back to her room and locked the door behind her.

Peace and quiet. Away from the cartoony insanity that is Foster’s Home for Imaginary Friends. Frankie rubbed her temples, “Use your head he says. He didn’t even tell me how he caught those sneakers! Swear this has to be some sort of cruel trick he played on me.” Rolling to one side of the bed, Frankie fished underneath and grabbed a box she kept there. A secret stash of cookies. One dozen that she’s kept since Madam Foster had made the last batch. In moments when she needed clarity, just one cookie would set her at ease. Then usually the rest would keep her satisfied for a while. Frankie could never stop at just one.

The redhead knocked off the top and gasped in horror. Just crumbs! Nothing left but crumbs! How could she just be so thoughtless as to eat them all like that? Frankie tossed the box on the other side of the room and plopped down on the bed.

She consoled herself. “It’s okay, Frankie. Just think about the cookies, that’ll set you straight. Remember how they looked. Delectable and ooey, gooey with the perfect ratio of cookie to chocolate chip. The brown cookie look spotted with chips. And the smell! So enticing and inviting…

Her mouth drooled in the beloved memories of her Grandma’s treat, “Now, I could use just one cookie more than ever.” Frankie’s mind drifted toward the first time she bit into one. That moment when the cookie split from itself yet the body still somewhat attached to itself. Ah.

Frankie’s memories aided her in lifting her spirits. The memories felt so vivid, it was like she could actually smell them in her own room.

Frankie opened her eyes to be greeted by the sight of a chocolate chip standing there with a smile and hands neatly folded in front of him.

“Hello!”

Frankie yelped in surprise, “Who are you and how did you get in my room?”

“Me? I’m your imaginary friend silly! You’ve just imagined me by thinking about your grandma’s cookies!”

“I did? Good job, Frankie.” The redhead mentally kicked herself. “Well…uh…okay. What’s your name?”

“Chip.”

“Okay, Chip. Come with me,” Frankie sighed and snatched its hands and headed for the door, dragging Chip in tow, “What are you doing?”

“My job.”

“Aren’t ya going to eat me? It’s my sole reason for existing!”

“Eat you? Oh no! I can’t…” Frankie bit her lip. She did create Chip for a reason. “I can’t eat an imaginary friend. You have feelings! Rights! A will to live!...and eyes. You’re basically a person!”

“A cookie-person!” Chip pointed out.

“Yes, a cookie-person, and what I did was wrong. Now come with me so I can get you registered. ”

“But what about my will to live? It’s to have you eat me! What else was I created to do?”

As creepy as that sounds, Chip was right. Imaginary friends are often created for a purpose. Most likely to keep someone else company. Come to someone’s aid. Or very rarely in crueler cases, be used for a single purpose and tossed away. In this case, Frankie wouldn’t be tossing him away, but still this was wrong. Morally and ethically. Yet, if Frankie ate Chip this could ease her out of getting a firm scolding from Herriman.

Even then. that means she would have to commit to eating this guy. He wasn't an ordinary cookie. Chip was tall enough to reach Frankie's mid thigh with a good circumference about him.

Inside, Numbuh 3 stayed up in the banisters, in the dark, and kept quiet as she watched from above what Mr fizz was doing. She saw him, and in his hands was a pack of mentos. This confused Numbuh 3. She took out her walkie talkie to tell Numbuh 1.

choices: A large machine with several different pipes extruding out!
At least a thousand small packes of colourful powder!
1452222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Free churros of course! While Miracle City High was hardly the most thrilling of places for Frida to waste her time, she couldn't resist the chance to snack on the tasty fried snack all day, even sneaking as many as she could into class and chomping them down while doing her best (which wasn't saying much) to feign interest in whatever class she happened to be trapped in. Despite all this constant eating currently doing little to take away her alluring hourglass figure, the wannabe rock star would soon have good reason to regret her gluttonous nature.

During this particularly long, hot day filled with countless hours of chemistry, maths and history which Frida was promptly ignoring in favor of snacking and drafting up a few songs to try out on her guitar back home, she spent her lunch hour with none other than her best friend Zoe. Over the years the two had (very) slowly started to resolve their differences with one another, Zoe apparently accepting that her and Manny weren't meant to be. Though ever since Manny was out of town, even the hyperactive Frida was starting to notice Zoe becoming a bit TOO close to her. From normal friendly gestures sneaking in a few snacks into their classes to more questionable acts like doing ALL her homework for her without being asked to extremes like constant presents, some which were pretty pricey like new clothes. It wouldn't of been so bad if Frida could return the favor, yet any attempt by her to buy a present for Zoe simply resulted in her politely refusing and buying her an even more expensive gift the next week.

So it was following these events that Zoe quickly ducked out and, returning from her locker with a large box behind her back walked back to Frida, who had a few churro's hanging out her mouth and a couple more wedged in between her perky breasts. "*Mmmpth* Oh manth- *Gulp* This isn't ANOTHER present, is it Zoe? No offense but it's starting to get a bit cre-" "A bit 'cheap'? Don't worry, I agree! I mean, I've still got to make it up to you for that 'vendetta' I had with you years ago, so I got you something this time I KNOW you'll love!" Opening the box, Frida's eyes widened. "Oh man, a new guitar!? Hang on..." Looking closer at the craftsman ship, her face dropped. "Oh my god, it's diamond studded? And is that gold lining the sides of it? Zoe, this more than anything else I can't accept , it'd of cost you a fortune!"

Muttering about how it 'didn't cost her a thing' as Frida failed to hear her, Zoe thrust it into her hands and beckoned her friend to follow her back into the school building. "Well keep it anyway Frida, I can't return it for... Erm... Let's just say 'complicated reasons'!" Almost running as she pulls Frida through the empty school hallway, she checked the coast was clear and the two quickly duck into a storage room Frida had been sure was almost always locked. "Now, THIS is something I've wanted to show you for a loooong time, especially with that backstabber Manny out of the way!" Zoe started as she tiptoes to a pile of boxes in the corner, Frida giving her a funny look as she hears the last line. "Zoe, what'd you call Manny?" Zoe quickly looked up and started to giggle awkwardly. "Eh, nothing! You misheard me! I don't have anything against the man who constantly broke my heart, nope, DEFINITELY nothing against you now toooooooI'll stop talking now, yes?"

Rolling her eyes and sitting down as Zoe rummages through the pile. Zoe was certainly acting stranger than usual, but she was well-aware that almost as soon as Zoe and her went from rivals to close friends, Zoe and Manny had become hostile towards one another. Frida was largely apathetic, as long as they never dragged her into their little spats with one another. She soon spied a few drawings hanging out of a box that seemed less dusty and unused then most of the others, grabbed them and started to laugh. "Oh man, Zoe you gotta check these out! Either Manny's now a terrible artist or some dork's been... Well, TRYING to draw me with tiny little love hearts all around me... Man, the head looks sorta like me, but if they couldn't draw a body right they didn't have to draw a HUGE circle for my stomach like I was a blimp! At least they had the common decency to to stash their crummy attempts at winning me over in here- Ahahahaha oh god there's even a poem on the other side of this one! Pfffft, oh man I'm not even going to read this out loud on account it's so completely lame!" Not noticing Zoe suddenly freeze and her panicked expression as she was too engrossed, Frida continued giggling at the anonymous, incredibly cheesy romantic gestures.

"Just as well they didn't sign it, I don't think whoever it was would want to live with the total embarrassment!" Frida snickered, looking over at Zoe to see whether she was finished looking for whatever it was yet. "Wonder if somebody tried to woo YOU over the same way and left it here..." Starting to rummage through the box, Frida sighed. "Nope, just a couple more about me... STILL with the crappy big bellies... And a few more..." The humour in her voice started to fade as she searches further and further. "Actually, this is getting kind've creepy now- they're ALL for me! And all by the same creep too..." She starts to back away from the box, looking over at Zoe for reassurance that the drawings, no matter how obsessive could harm her beyond a mild paper cut. "Eh, Zoe... You finished finding your thing yet? This room's reeeeally creeping me out now..."

Letting out a satisfied groan as she pulled out a large box from the bottom of the pile and wiping her brow, Zoe pushed it with her entire body towards Frida. "Don't worry, I'm sure I- Did I say 'I'? Boy I'm sure out of it today! I mean, WHOEVER drew all those pictures of you probably MEANT well~!" she says, smiling awkwardly as she tries to subtly kick it underneath a table as she starts to lift off the lid to her own box. "But forget THAT- I have something in here I KNOW won't creep you out in the slightest!" Zoe proclaims as she whiped off the lid triumphantly, smiling earnestly as she waited for Frida's reaction to what lied inside.

And what lied inside is...
1452222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Vendetta's eventually die out

1452222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"XJ9...XJ9. XJ9, you can wake up now!"

Jenny's eyes opened as her systems rebooted from sleep mode, finding herself on the maintenance table in her mom's lab. Yawning just a little as her core finished its processing checks, the robot girl sat up, looking at her mom. "Do we have to go through that every time you need to give me an upgrade, Mom?"

"Ah-ah! This one was a full-body upgrade, XJ9, so I couldn't have you online while I installed it," Mrs. Wakeman replied, waggling a finger with a slight smile. Failing to notice her artificial daughter's eyeroll at her gesture, the scientist moved over to the display monitor, activating it and beginning a slideshow of what she had installed inside Jenny's body. Taking out a pointer, she cleared her throat before starting. "I took the liberty of compiling detailed statistics of repairs-" -tap- "-damage sustained-" -tap- "-and property damage incurred. Now, this last one is the stickler, as despite your best effort to minimize collateral..."

All the numbers made sense. Despite her best care in protecting the city, Jenny knew she couldn't keep everything from being destroyed. It was a physical impossibility. That, and the robot girl was pretty sure that Nora had nearly replaced her entire system once over at this point with how much trouble she got in. What Jenny wasn't prepared for was the staggering costs shown on the next slide along with a picture of their city almost completely demolished, thanks to that particular baddie's penchant for using her as a living bludgeon. Even her mom was visibly exasperated, looking at Jenny with "At least you tried!" in her eyes. "Well if this keeps up, despite the advances in technology making it easier to repair everything after these incidents, the city's going to be making us pay for it."

Her jaw almost literally fell off it dropped so far. The price was astronomical! Even with Nora Wakeman's genius, her inventions and her work, there was no way she was going to be able to pay off the damage each time someone invaded! Shaking her head with her pigtail jets swiveling wildly, Jenny swung her legs off the table and stood up. "No way! They can't make us pay for all that!"

"Ooooh they can. And it's a possibility they will. Besides, creating spare parts for everything that gets destroyed on you is wholly draining. Last time it happened I went without a week of sleep! And so, XJ9, I present to you-" Mrs. Wakeman moved to the next slide, which showed Jenny's newest upgrade.
1452222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Nora Wakeman's Newest Idea

choices: -the bell! I'm gonna be late for class!"
1452222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"So, what does it do?" Jenny asked, looking at her redesigned schematics From what it looked like, they was quite a lot of ultra-strength, micro-thin fabric placed inside her body, along with a number of small canisters that looked like foam extinguishers. Just from the picture alone she couldn't quite tell how they were supposed to work, but her mother had obviously thought about it long before.

"In simple terms, XJ9? A solid-state airbag. If you sustain an impact hard enough to trigger the foam dispensers, they rapidly dump a special compound I've created which expands into a dense, highly shock-absorbent foam which fills up the containment vessels you see there, made out of a type of fabric used for high-tension industrial applications. The only way to break it and release the foam would be to shoot a nail at light speed into you!" Nora smiled proudly. There were no pictures or simulations of course, but the explanation was simple enough. Looking at her daughter's eyes and seeing the questions, the white-haired scientist continued, "The release and subsequent amount of foam have been preprogrammed into your body's OS to know exactly how much foam to dispense each time. Not only that, it can also localize the foam's release if need be. Simply put, the harder you get hit, the more foam is dispersed to absorb the shockwave."

Unlike many of her mom's attempted upgrades without her approval, this one was completely unobtrusive to Jenny. It didn't particularly affect her appearance, nor did it hinder her fighting abilities.Uniquely, it seemed that her mother had actually found a way to make it useful without being embarrassing. "Wait, but what getting rid of the foam after the impact?"

Nora shook her head. "Not to worry, dear, the foam has a quick-collapse time limit if it's left undisturbed and the monitoring suite is functioning properly. The dispensers will activate again and use a chemical to reabsorb and condense the foam, and if it can't do that, then it breaks it down and retracts the cushion, returning you to normal."

Before Jenny could reply, a light klaxon alarm sprouted from her chest and she began to panic. "Shoot! It's-"

151211.content:
It was, once again, dawn over high rise Tokyo, the shining sunbeams blazing through the blinds, tall rays of light, lines of sun glaring onto the floor, the dust in the air glimmering like stars, fluffy bits of the carpet and clothing, dust and such.
The garden outside was lit up with brilliant sunshine, the small pond reflecting the bright rays randomly, it's surface hardly moving, it looked as if glitter had been scattered upon it, the rocks around it wet and shining, with a strangely chrome look.
On a bed in one of the bedrooms was a sprawled mess of bedclothes, from under it uttered a growl-like tone, the covers moved to reveal Renamon's head.
"I wonder what time it is"
The room was fairly tidy, seeing as she didn't really own many belongings, wih a few plates by the side of the bed, and a laptop, acquired from Rika as a gift, Renamon took little interest in it, but it plagued her mind with how she should be grateful and that Rika might take offend, which was the last thing she'd like to do

There was a quiet *thud* as she rolled out of bed and delicately walked over to the door, which looked out over the garden, slowly she walked down the hallway to the kitchen, she stopped halfway when she noticed how wonderful the view was this early in the morn.
She smiled, something she'd seen more of since the end of the crisis, pretty peaceful now, well, as peaceful as life is without immediate, life-threatening danger.
As she walked into the kitchen, she was immediately confronted with a bombsite of dishes, rubbish, and various other clutter that gathers in kitchens, wasn't THAT bad.
"I should wait until Rika wakes up for breakfast, hrumph, why'd I wake up this early?"
151211.title: Dawn

1512111.content:
Rena thought to herself, it would be fine, "Yea.. I suppose i could tiny up as I go along, I could tidy some stuff up as get it... I guess."
She shuffled over to a counter and opened a cupboard. The kitchen wasn't that bad, it was just cluttered, stuff was sprawled on the sides, general crap like that.
She groaned, "Pffft there's only damn chips" Taking some out she examined the packet, it was a branded bag of plain or salted potato chips "Suppose they look ok..."
Rena popped open the bag and started nonchalantly munching the chips, she walked back to Rika's room tiredly, the sun was just starting to rise above the garden wall, shining a nice line of light shafts into the hallway. As she walked back to Rika's room she was just sat up, rubbing her eyes.
"You awake?"
"Looks like it" Rika replied sarcastically.

Rena walked over to a chair in the room and took a seat, Rika's room had become more and more cluttered since the incident, unused mats and generic chairs were littered around. As she sat down, the chair creaked loudly, She jumped up and glanced at the chair "Ah! I hate the chairs in here, they seem to be so old.
"Don't creak when I sit on them" Rika mumbled, half asleep "I mean, not that that um, means anything."
"Mm?" Rena asked, not hearing Rika's mumble, "Oh yea, Rika, do you want breakfast?"
Rika laid back down, and said sleepily "No... No it's ok just get some for yourself, Mom's home this evening so... *yawn*"
Rena replied happily "Ok I guess that's fine too."

Rika looked back at Renamon when her chair creaked as she leaped up, She looks different recently, could she of... Gained weight?.
"Hey Renamon?"
"Mmm?" She asked back with a mouth full of chips.
It sounds really unlikely... Rika thought to herself Although she HAS been eating quite a bit more since the whole thing with... I'll talk to her about it later.

He was like this partly because he was worried that she might get herself hurt or even worse (in his eyes) arrested, and partly because thats just the way Mr J was.

Mr J had sent young Harly on, what he thought, was a very simple mission. All she had to do was go to the hydro electrical dam, which was on the outskirts of Gotham City, and basically destroy it. Some people may think that this doesn't sound simple at all, but these people had never met Harly, so they could never understand the trust Mr J had in her. But this time Mr J was wrong. Dead wrong infact.

Harly awoke in the morning feeling extremely groggy. It had been a rough night, she could tell by her pounding head ache and by the fact that she had slept in her HarlyQuin outfit. Suddenly somebody knocked on her apartment door. It was...

Now Mr J would credit Harly with more intelligence than she showed here because, foolishly, Harly trusted Ivy.

It was common knowledge that The Joker was infact trying to seize control of Gotham for himself, he was beginning to spear head every criminal activity which happened in Gotham from smuggling to armed robbery, in short he was seizing power over the Gotham criminal underworld. Of course it's common knowledge that there are ALOT of criminals in Gotham, but luckily most of the main criminals (The penguin, the riddler, 2 face etc) were safely locked away in the high security wing of the local psychiatric hospital. However Poison Ivy was one of the few who had managed to evade the law, and she was having the same idea as The Joker, which was to take control of Gotham whilst all of the main criminal competition were locked away. Just get a head start on the competition. Simple.

Ivy knew the Joker's plans due to a little spy work from one of her top men (Harly's main reason for believing Ivy was simply that if she was lying, then how would she have known about the mission?). Ivy didn't want the dam destroyed (the only reason why The Joker did was simple and rather insane, he wanted to destroy Batman, and he figured that flooding the city was the way to do it, The Joker had more than one screw loose) so her plan was basically to lead Harly into a trap (from which there was no escape) and alert the police. 1521222212211.content:
There was a large rumbling sound from the dam and within the blink of an eye water began rushing from the hole, all of it forcing it's way down Harly's throat into her stomach.

Now you may remember that Ivy injected Harly with a tranquilizer of her own design, well it wasn't just a tranquilizer. Ivy had added a compound to the tranquilizer solution with very strange capabilities, it caused living tissue to become rubberized. Which basically meant, with the right amount of pressure the victims body could stretch to infinite sizes, and to Harly's dismay, this was exactly what was happening to her.

From the first initial burst of water Harly could feel the cold liquid traveling down her throat and into her stomach. It was a very bizarre feeling, having water coming down your throat at that speed, it wasn't painful at all, infact it was almost a euphoric feeling. Slowly but surely Harly could feel her stomach swelling with water. She watched in amazement as her stomach began to push against her tight Harlyquin outfit (luckily her outfit could take some strain), soon her stomach was like an over inflated basketball, perfectly rounded, emitting a strange squeaking sound. Ivy began to laugh insanely,

"I'll fill you so full you won't be able to escape!" She cackled, "And by the way... the effects are permanent!", Harly began to try and struggle free. But it was no use. Partly because the vines grip was to powerful and partly because she was enjoying the feeling of being inflated.

After 2 minutes of inflation Harly's stomach was like a huge beachball. Her stomach was still perfectly rounded and it stuck out a good 25 inches, her body kept squeaking as more and more water was forced into her.

After another minute (by which time Harly's stomach was beginning to absorb her legs, as it was roughly 30 inches at every angle), Ivy commanded the vines to pull Harly away from the dam. Harly looked at herself and let out a wail.

What happened next?

15212222122111211212.content:
Police Chief James Gordan sat alone in his dingy office in the equally dingy Gotham City Police Department Building. He was thinking, as he often did, about the crime of Gotham City. Recent studies had shown yet another dramatic increase of violent crime in the city, and once again all the blame was being squarely directed at him. No matter how hard James Gordan and his police department tried, they just couldn't seem to make a difference in the city, it seemed that everytime a criminal was put away another would spring up out of no where and go on an even worse crime spree. Even with the aid of The Batman it still seemed that the city was doomed... that it was beyond help. Recently Harlyquin had been released from Arkham Asylum, and she had been nothing but a ball ache since. Gordan was determined to put her away again, because he was sick and tired of her open mockery of the law. All he needed was a lead, she had to slip up sometime and when she did Gordan wanted to be there, he wanted to see the look on her face when he finally brought her down... he wanted to laugh at her embarrassment.

Gordan pulled out one of his large, expensive cigars from his desk, and proceeded to smoke it. Suddenly there was a knock at the door and a rookie cop entered the room.

"Sir, we've just received an urgent call" He said breathlessly, "apparently Harlyquin attempted to destroy the Gotham City dam, and she's been apprehended by person or persons anonymous"

Gordan smiled and puffed absent mindedly on his cigar.

"Is that so?" He said happily, "Well I think we'd better get down there... I'd quite like to say hello to Harlyquin"

With that, Gordan threw on his large trench coat and rushed off with a squad of police to the scene of the apparent crime. When the police finally reached the dam they saw...

What happens next?

15412.content:
It all began when Princess Sally decided to take a walk through the Great Forest. She occasionally needed some time to herself, so she took a walk every so often to clear her head. The walk was uneventful until Sally accidentally kicked something in the path.

"Hmm? What do we have here?" Sally uttered, bending over to pick up the object.

It was small metal container, measuring 6x6 and two inches thick. It was sealed by a small clasp. Sally opened it up.

One side of the container were two sheets of thirty-six capsules, the other had one extra capsule, and two folded pieces of paper. One was labeled "map." The other paper wasn't labeled. Sally read the unlabeled paper first. It was some type of shortened lab report.

"Genetic enhancement capsule. Dermal strength increase by ten. Unsolvable side effect: dermal elasticity increase by ten, eventual spread to whole body." Sally scanned. She put the paper back and took the map out.

-----

After following the map, Sally found herself at a cave somewhere in the middle of the forest. The mouth of the cave was sealed off by a door with an old, computerized lock. In took a minute for Nicole, Sally's minicomputer, to pick said lock.

I wonder why this place wasn't marked on the maps at Knothole. Sally thought.

-----

Once inside, Sally followed a path into a large hangar of some sort. There were also numerous gas tanks, hoses, and numerous valves, which probably accessed a water source.

A smile crept up across Sally's face. She took out the lab report again and read the whole thing. She always wanted a talent that was unique to herself.

From what she read, who ever swallowed a capsule would have the ability to inflate themselves for one week, as well as more resilient flesh. There were a few problems though. If a person took more than one capsule per day, they risked they change being permanent. Also, each new capsule multiplied the effect of the previous capsule. The maximum number of pills that could be taken without guaranteeing permanent change was four.

-----

After downing five capsules, Sally walked to a tank of oxygen, connected a hose, and put the free end into her mouth...

155222212222222112.content:
One!

Two!

Three!

Four!

…Five…

The two red-headed scientists watch Gil rack the barbell and throw the towel dripping with sweat on the ground, “Dang it! At this point I’ll never be bigger than Mister Mistro.” Gil sighed. He pulled out a magazine cover with an overly buff man surrounded by women.

“Ah, Gil!” Mary pulled out the same magazine cover. Susan too looked at it longingly, “That could be us caressing his biceps.” Mary tossed the magazine away, “I know of a way we can help Gil! Look at what I’ve been working on.” Out of her pants pocket, Mary pulled out a normal purple pill that fit between her fingers.

“Is that a…?”

“Mhm. Appetite Stimulator Pill or ASP for short,” Mary pulled up a chart on the big screen, “Since muscle growth is directly correlated with muscle strain and calorie consumption. This pill will increase calorie consumption by one thousand percent.”

“Thus increasing the rate Gil can grow muscle! Then he’ll be our big hunk forever!” Susan swooned over the thought. Mary swooned as well, “Yeah. How dreamy do you think that would be?”

“Really dreamy.”

“The only thing separating us from that fantastic reality is a test subject.”


“Well, where’s Johnny?” Susan ran to the door impatiently. Mary’s hand stopped her further movement. “Dad took Johnny out for the day and since the FBI stuck that ‘No Random Test Subject’ bill on us, I guess…”, Susan grimaced, “It’s gonna have to be one of us.”

“Rock, paper, scissors?”

Three pumps of their fists and the final word “Scissors” had the two come to a result. Susan held rock. Mary held paper, “Oh, crap.”

Mary held the pill close to her sister’s face, “Come on…take it!” She sang. Susan reeled back, “Are you sure we can’t use an animal or Dukey! What about-,” While her sister flapped her gums, Mary took the opportunity to pop the pill into Susan’s mouth. Susan begrudgingly swallows the bill, “Ugh. That wasn’t so bad. Now what?”

“Workout, of course. Get down and give me ten!” Mary instructed including a blow of a whistle. Without an alternative, Susan complied by getting on her back and started some sort of weird sit-up motion. Only a few sit-ups into the workout and a loud rumbling came from Susan’s stomach, “Hungry already, huh? Definitely an unintended side effect.”

“Yeah and I’m feeling really exhausted too. Can I please have something to eat?” Mary shot Susan a quizzical look, but with the sweat dripping from the nerds face she couldn’t say otherwise. The press of a big red button allowed a table to rise from below ground level with a tray of fresh, streaming burgers. There was nary a second in-between Susan laying on the ground and stuffing her face. The skirt wearing test sister ate with gusto and greed. Filling her mouth with carbs and proteins with uncalculated chomps into each burger, “Woah, you really were hungry!”

Susan licked the remaining cheese and bit of burger from her fingers, “That was…really, really tasty…”

“That’s strange. Usually we don’t eat like that unless it’s cake and candy. Let me take some measurements.” Mary took a measuring tape and wrapped it around Susan’s middle. She brought it back and compared the measurements from the one’s taken from before, “Hm. Your stomach is four inches bigger than usual and your waist has gone up by five.”

Now that Mary mentioned it, her skirt is digging in her sides, “IT IS?! That’s…”
155222212222222112.title: Susan, the unwilling test subject

choices: Didn't seem to notice anything new about Susan
1552222122222221122.content:
Susan smiled toward her sister in desperate hope, “You really think so? Big girls may be his thing...” Mary put an arm around Susan’s shoulder, “Susan, I know so! We’re geniuses, remember?” Susan rubbed her distended stomach, already processing the food into the fat thanks to the properties of the pill.

“Now, why don’t we get you up a dress size or two so you can ‘woo’ Gil!”, cheered Mary, “To the kitchen!”

Downstairs in the kitchen, Mary kicked the fridge door close and placed what remained edible onto the table. Susan, who's already deep in a ravenous state reached forward and pulled loafs of bread, butter, and muffins to cram into her mouth. The pill had made it so that her stomach can easily be considered a bottomless pit.

Cake, turkey legs, and even their dad's leftover meatloaf wasn't safe from Susan's hungry teeth, "That’s the last of what we have. How’s my ‘big’ sister doing?" Mary only heard a short muffled response from Susan while she got a good look at her handwork.

Susan’s blue star shirt that covered her bellybutton hours ago rode up to her ample chest with the fat on her stomach rounding out and taking residence in her lap. Her chest had gone up a few cup sizes, sitting comfortably at C cup or roughly the size of grapefruits confined in the shirt. Below, Susan’s skirt merely saved itself by stretching along her growing waistline in sacrifice of covering her thickening legs. Her thighs spread along the chair with the fat making her calves grow, stretching the fabric of her long socks.

The red-headed scientist's eyes shot to the legs of the chair that began to buckle underneath Susan's increasing weight, "Okay. I think you've had enough to eat," Mary said helping Susan up from the chair, "By Jove, I'm huge!" Susan said in delight with a smile across her chubby cheeks.

The star-scientist cradled her stomach in her arms. Just in a few hours it's become a soft ball of doughy fat, "You really think Gil is going to like me like this? How do I look?"

The moon sister gave a thumbs up, "You look positively plump! Now, go on! Show Gil the new you (if you can even fit through the door)." Mary said in fascination of Susan growing wide in such a short time.

Susan waddled out of the kitchen door, her extra weight making it much harder to walk properly. Every step, Susan fussed with her ill-fitting clothing until she approached Gil in his backyard, “H-Hi, Gil."

Gil Nexdoor, the boy Susan and Mary have spent years fawning over,flipped his golden locks and looked at Susan, "N-notice anything different?"

Gil...

choices: While doing the chores, Susan stumps into the potion room
A magical creature comes into the shop
15522221222222222222211.content:
Susan couldn't be more at pure bliss. A day off work, Jake and Hayley were off to school, and her husband had left for a long day at work. The fireplace was lit brightly and the television blared Susan's favorite daytime programming, "This is heaven." she gasped throwing her head back onto the couch. She was glad, today would be a day where thought would be gathered and it would be time for Susan to be Susan.

Almost unexpectedly, a rapping emitted from the front door. Susan took a deep breath to control herself from yelling at whoever dared to disturb her day of rest. Calmly she opened the door and saw no one in front of her, "Ugh."Susan was about to shut the door close and return to her lazy festivities when a muffled cough and a foot in the door surprised her. "Hi, dad! Sorry I didn't see you there."

That foot in the door belonged to Lao Shi or also titled, 'G', grandpa, or in this case 'father'. Susan was sort of embarrassed for indirectly insulting her father for not seeing him due to his incredibly short stature. "Susan I have a job for you," the ancient man spoke, "I need you to-" Susan dropped and groaned. "Sorry, father, it's my day off and-" Lao Shi raised a snow white eyebrow, "Susan."

Susan had given up and huffed, "Okay, let me get me regular clothes on."

At her grandfather's shop, Lao Shi lectured Susan that he needed to go to the magical world to pick up a few shipments and that he would be gone for the whole day. When Susan asked about Fu Dog, Lao Shi told her that he was last seen heading for the casino, and Susan knew it would be a few weeks. "Okay, then father! Your store will be in good hands!" Susan gave a fake bright smile and waved him off.

After that door closed, Susan sat herself down on a dusty chair, coughed, and looked at the chore sheet she was given, "No wonder Jake doesn't like spending time here. It's so dusty." Coincidentally, the first chore on the list was to dust the shop.
15522221222222222222211.title: STARTING UP!

155222212222222222222111.content:
Susan wrapped her fingers around the broom handle and quickly snapped into form. The bristles carried the dust to wherever Susan wanted and she decided to redirect it right next to the door. Sweeping brought her back to the days when Lao Shi actually had customers many years ago. When people actually bought items from this old place and the tech was actually up-to-date.

Now the technology in stock is at least ten years old. Unless someone is looking for old parts computer parts this shop would continue to be devoid of any business. Which is fine given the magical business that sometimes goes on here, you wouldn’t necessarily want people coming in and out. Speaking of the back room, it should be really dusty back there.

“Sigh. Let’s give it a look.”

Susan piled the dust into one and entered the back area that fittingly had a 'Do Not Enter' sign to the right of the doorframe.
Upon pushing past the bead curtain Susan felt overcome by the thicker air, “Oh. Geez. This place needs a vacuuming too,” she clutched the broom and whipped away the overhead spider webs, “Ugh, Father.” Susan set the broom aside and grabbed a dusty duster that too was dusty, and dusted the scrolls hanging on the wall.

“Well, that was easy. What needs dusting next?”

Around the room were shelves of vials, bottles, and beakers stacked with potions – some glowed; others didn’t. A chest full of magical artifacts that belonged to Fu Dog. Training dummies no doubt made by Lao Shi for Jake’s training. And Lao Shi’s ancient Chinese Artifacts just smothered with dust.

Susan directs her cleaning curiosity toward…
155222212222222222222111.title: 'Do not enter' doesn't have a welcome mat

choices: It's getting close to lunch time
1552222122222222222221111.content:
"How could he let these vials get caked in dust like this?" Susan said pinching the feather duster and lightly swiping over the glass containers. Her movement was swift, yet careful enough to not knock any over. With her height compared to her short statutes father, she could see why he had given up on dusting the vials.

At the end of dusting the vials there was a moment of imperfection in her wrists movement. The vial, uncorked unfortunately, fell to its side letting the liquid inside run out onto the shelf and drip onto Susan.

"Crap! I gotta be more careful."

Susan dashes to the bathroom where she turns the faucet knob and dips her head in the water. She believes that washing off a magical concoction will be the same method as washing off spilled chemicals.

"That's better...I hope."

Susan towels off the excess water from her hair and swipes the remaining droplets from her green shirt. That's when she notices...
1552222122222222222221111.title: Carefully dusting the potion shelf

choices: Gluttana, the physical embodiment of gluttony.
15522221222222222222211111.content:
HICCUP

“That’s…new?”

Susan, who swiped the excess water from her shirt, felt an alien obstruction on her abdomen. That obstruction happened to be her abdomen, a small potbelly had somehow come to be. The sudden growth made it so that Susan’s green shirt no longer covered her navel. Susan gulped at the wardrobe malfunction and took a step back, “Okay. Susan think rationally. This is from the donuts you munched on from breakfast. You know what carbs do to you.” She said exaggerating the memory of the two doughnuts she had for breakfast.

The self-talk aided in calming her nerves. To restrain her mind from thinking the potion had any doing in her possible sudden growth, Susan looked once more at the chore list. Next on the list is-“Washing windows. Easy.”

Walking back into the bathroom where she had previously soaked her hair, Susan had failed to notice that the mirror could barely reflect her image. It was terribly stained and smudged with soapy residue and a bunch of other unidentifiable stains. When she looked down to grab the window cleaner and rag, Susan caught a glimpse of her potbelly once more. The more she looked at it, the juicer her love handles looked at the tighter her jeans felt. Not to mention, her boobs felt bigger too. Susan pinched her bloated stomach and gently caressed the adipose before shaking the thoughts off and started washing off the window.

Despite being tasked with the chore of window washing Susan spent more time adjusting her clothes and pinching her fat rather than cleaning. Down to the point where she was playing with her breasts, full well knowing they felt fuller than before. Possibly at C cups now rather than the comfortable B cups they once were.

“Stop it, Susan! This is just something all in your head. You’re just one swipe away from cleaning the mirror. Forget your body and just do it.” One final swipe restored the mirror to its former glory. Susan pushed back any thoughts of her growth after looking at her reflection in the mirror. She brought the list to her eyes once more.

“Next is to-HICCUP-“

At that moment of the hiccup, Susan knew something was wrong. The paper had shrunk some inches right before her eyes. Susan looked at the mirror again and gasped in shock. She had found herself now taller than the actual pane of glass, “Oh, man! Oh, man! Oh, man! What do I do?” she panicked feeling the increased jostling of her stomach as she moved around.

As if growing upward wasn’t a bad enough, growing wider only worsened Susan’s anxiety about the current situation. Her shirt hard rested on the apex of her stomach leaving most of the round mass hanging over the waistband. The sleeves of her shirt now pinched her doughy upper arms and her shoulders appeared more padded. Her neck, thicker, and face more puffy. A double chin now appeared along with chubby cheeks.

Susan grumbled as she struggled to move her arms. It wasn’t due to her breasts overflowing her bra pas the point of causing a pinch on her back. The culprit was her now too small jacket. “This is one of a kind! I afford to have it rip!” Susan shimmied the jacket off of her, her belly and breasts bounced around in her shimmying. Now that her pink jacket rested on the sink, she calmed down a bit.

In that bit of calm, Susan could have some clarity, “I should call father! He’ll know what to do.” Reaching down into her pockets, her fingers barely slip through. All she could feel was the side of the phone and her softer thigh flesh through the material. Through pushing the cellphone out of her pocket through the outside, Susan smiled as this situation looked to be over soon.

And then-“Aw, man! You’ve got to be kidding me!” Susan cried the moment she saw her thumb covered the entire screen. At this point she’s much too big to use a phone let alone a land line. Going outside would be a big mistake as it would give away the magical element of the world.

“Oh wait! Just remembered the summon scroll father keeps in the back!”

Quickly, she get out of the bathroom. Her hips bumped against the door frame as she strode through the main store, “Still no customers. As usual. Good.” The unfamiliar sound of the floorboards creaking underneath her feet only further confirmed her panic. With every stride she felt the wobbling of the sudden fat on her body.

It was nice having the long, curvy legs that she did, but never did she want a big, juicy ass that her jeans couldn’t cover up. But it felt like her pants were hugging her rump much more tightly than before. Susan hiked her pants up once more only to hear a light tearing coming from the hemline of the hips. Susan gulped and frantically searched for the scroll.

Carefully with her fingers, Susan unwraps the scroll and placed it respectfully on the scroll stand.

She looked down only to see an obscured view of her breasts blocking her sight of the scroll. “Oh.” Retrieving a chair, Susan sits down, the action caused her thighs to spread out committing a greater tear amongst her pants. Susan whimpered again and gulped. She looked at the scroll.

Admittedly her Chinese is a little rusty, but with a good college try Susan could summon someone who could undo the effects of the potion. With a few sentences of spoken Chinese, a cloud forms in the middle of the room and opens a portal that drops in…

choices: A pond with chocolate and cotton candy trees
1552222122222222222222211.content:
After the Shichibukai Bartholomew Kuma had sent all the straw hats away Nami landed on a beach of an island. After traveling 3 days without anything to eat or to drink. She decided to go into the forest near by the beach. But first she found a coconut tree which she shacked and some coconuts fell from the tree. The cat burglar broke them into pieces and drank from them so she could survive the marsh into the forest a bit longer.


She walked about 10 minutes without knowing where to go and then she saw something strange……….
1552222122222222222222211.title: Nami!

15522221222222222222222111.content:
Nami couldn’t believe her eyes. “On which island I am?” she questioned herself. Suddenly her stomach grumbled. “Hmm something to eat wouldn’t heart” she said. So she headed directly to the pond, because she loves chocolate. Her eyes only focused the pond and not what was on the way to it.

All of a sudden she couldn’t move forward she stepped into a puddle full of chocolate. She tried to escape but the more she moved the more she sank into the chocolate. The navigator thought of a way to navigate her out. The limbs of the cotton candy trees were nowhere to reach for the orange-haired girl.
Her legs were now completely in the puddle, only her upper body stands out. “What can I do?” she asked herself. “It is chocolate so maybe I can eat me free?” that’s the only chance I got.

She digged her hands into the chocolate and put into her mouth. The first taste of the chocolate was unbelievable she had never tasted anything better in her life before. With this pleasant flavor in her mouth she digged deeper and deeper. Halfway through she suddenly heard a crackle behind her. But it was nothing to mention because she had to get out of there first. Her stomach was stuffed from the amount of chocolate and looked like she is in the early stages of pregnancy. Finally her legs were free and she jumped immediately out of the puddle before the chocolate could get her again. She went to a tree to rest there, unexpectedly something hit here on her neck. She checked her neck and felt a little needle on her neck. Swiftly her eyes and she couldn’t identify the shadow which came near to her……
15522221222222222222222111.title: A pond with chocolate and cotton candy trees

155222212222222222222221111.content:
Nami slowly stood up her stuffed gut from yesterday was all gone. She rubbed her eyes in disbelief to see who was standing in front of her. It was a small dwarf, with a large hat and a staff in his hand.

“Welcome, my lady”, he said “I am sorry that we had to kidnap you put it was the only way.”

“The only way!” Nami shouted. “You could have asked me if you had the guts to step in front of me maybe I would have come with you.”

“Maybe, maybe not” the dwarf said. “But at the moment you are here and we need you desperately”.

“And can you tell me why you need me?” the orange-haired navigator asked.

“Ahh that’s a good question because our country is in danger. You stumbled over a chocolate pond and cotton candy trees, didn’t you?” the dwarf asked.

“Yes I did and I almost paid with my life” the cat burglar said.

“So you can see the danger we need you to ban all kind of sweets from this island because we got only a small terrain to live in and they try to get that also” the gnome explained.

“And who are they?” Nami asked.

“They are the chocolate monsters and more creatures that can control and create sweets all over the island” the dwarf said.

“Ohhh ok, and what should I do with them? Eat them?” she asked ironically.
155222212222222222222221111.title: Where I am?

1552222122222222222222211111.content:
"You are a clever girl! The problem is that we are way too small to fight these creatures and that they are way stronger than we are. Beside this we can't eat this much food because of our size. so we had to wait until someone comes and helps us. Thank god for your arrival!" said the dwarf.

"I dont know if I want to help you, I got seperate from my crew and I should really search for them.They will also search for me so I can't dig deeper into this land." answered Nami.

"That is very sad. But from which crew are you? So maybe we can help you and then you can help us." asked the small man.

Nami stood still for a brief moment and thought what she could say to this question. Maybe it is better not to say to which crew she belongs. But the dwarf seems really nice so she answered: "Iam from the strawhat pirates!"

"Ahh, I read about your captain in the newspaper this morning. I got with me do you want to read it?" said the man.

"Of course I want to read it!"

The dwarf handed the newspaper over and Nami began to read through the news. She captured the picture of Luffy and saw the hidden message. "So it is two years and not three days. How selfish of him. Dwarf now you can thank the gods it seems that Iam here on this island a little longer than I expected".

The dwarf jumped high in the air and was smiling all over the place. "You can call me Rem then I will show you my village and you can meet some other people. Or do you want to go into the forest without knowing what is in there?"
1552222122222222222222211111.title: Smart Girl

15522221222222222222222111111.content:
The village was not far away from the place where they talked. They chatted a little bit and Nami began to really like Rem. They entered the village and Nami had to watch out that she does not step on the tiny houses. There were also some houses on the trees were the dwarves looked in disbelief to Nami. They never saw a human in their life before.

"I will bring you to our eldest and wisest person in this town. He can explain you the situation more properly then I can" said Rem.

Both were wandering through the village as they come across a cave which they entered with any hesitation.

"Hello Viktor" said Nami's new best friend. A deep voice answered: "Hello Rem, and who is with you?"

"My name is Nami and Rem told me about the small problem you have on this island."

"This is no small problem young girl. Our forest will soon be gone if we cannot put it on hold. The monsters are coming closer to us with every day and we cannot move anymore because the ocean is behind us. We need your help as fast as you can. You must go into the forest and find the witch who controls the south terrain and put her to rest then we have room to breathe and then we can continue with the next steps. As far as we know she lives in a house under the grand tree guarded by some biscuit warriors and other evil candy things. To get to this place it takes almost a day so If you could change your outfit and jump into the woods, I would be very thankful."

"Hold on old man. First why do I have to change my outfit? Second an evil witch no one told me about that! What are her weaknesses? Third what are biscuit warriors? And last what do I get when I help you?"

1st: "Your outfit is dirty, and your clothes won't last that long in the forest
2nd: Now you know about her! We do not know her weaknesses if we know that then we would have fought her.
3rd: The witch can create these soldiers they are a little bit taller than and can attack you if a sword. But i think they should be no problem for you.
4th: You will receive honor and we are a very rich nation so you will be payed excellent!"

"Okay so far so good, but I don't think you got clothes in my size here" the cat burglar said.

"No problem, I can create you everything. Shall we give it a try?"
15522221222222222222222111111.title: Go to the village

155222212222222222222221111111.content:
Viktor casted a spell and in no time at all her dirty clothes were replaced with a red and white skirt and a cute red shirt with white thigh high stockings which fits her perfect. She also got some new white thigh high stockings and a pair of red ballerinas. Her makeover was almost done. Her messed up hair got back in the right place and she got two braids which fall to both sides of her neck.

"Wow!" she gasped.

"No problem! Your outfit is very elastic, and it should not rip. Now you can go on and start your journey to defeat the witch! Rem will help you. He is a good fighter and knows the forest well." said the wizard.

So Nami and Rem started the journey. Nami got her clima-tact with her and the dwarf got his shield and sword with him. They entered the candy forest and an overwhelming smell from gingerbread was their first welcome. There cotton candy trees, a large pond of chocolate and lollipop flowers. Nami's stomach began to rumble by the smell of all these tasty sweets.

"Do you mind if I taste something of these candys?" she asked.
"You can try it this part of the forest seems safe. I will look for the next way but be careful." he said.

Nami began to pick some cotton candy from the bushes and like yesterday it tastes like pure heaven. Grab after grab half of the bush was gone and she began to feel thirsty, so she went to the pond and kneeled to drink the chocolate from the pond. As she began drinking the water in the pond started to ripple. Then the ground started shaking and some tree branches began to creak. Something big is making their way to the location of Nami. The navigator was unable to move as a 5-meter-tall gingerbread man appeared on the other side of the pond.

"Hello little girl!" the creatures said.
"As I can see you are enjoying yourselves a little bit too much in this part of the forest!" said the giant by noticing that one cotton candy bush was half gone.
"So how do you want to repay me for the damage you just did? Money or Life"? he roared.

"I got no Money with me! I am sorry!"

"So, it is your life then" he screamed and rushed forward towards the straw-hat girl.
155222212222222222222221111111.title: Give it a try

info.description: Choose which cartoon female you want to expand and how (whether it be weight gain or inflation etc). Here are the only rules of the story - No male expansion please, or anything about farting, faeces, popping or vore. Anything else is fine, so have fun! Also I would like to add that force feeding, and generally gaining against the victims will is encouraged by not mandatory. I am by no means saying im a decent writer or anything, but I would also prefer that all additions are written relatively well, with no sudden jumps in weight (although it doesn't have to be agonizingly slow either) or complete deviations from story that make no sense. But yes, please add and remember... Have fun :)
